label: 灰烬之年 Age of Ashes

Accursed Forge-Spurned.name: 被诅咒的锻炉废料 Accursed Forge-Spurned
Accursed Forge-Spurned.hp: 永恒神谴, 负能量治疗

equipment-Soul Chain.name: +2高等强击炽焰精金灵魂锁链 Soul Chain
equipment-Soul Chain.description:
这种4英尺的链条附着倒钩，一端或两段都有尖刺。有些会配置金属环作为握把。

一位锻炉废料挥舞着一条灵魂锁链：一条被诅咒的+1强击炽焰刺链。任何持有灵魂锁链的生物每天日落时必须成功通过@Check[type:will|dc:22|name:Soul Chain Transformation]豁免，否则将被永久转化为锻炉废料。一个失去了灵魂锁链的锻炉废料会不惜一切代价去找回它。

Eternal Damnation.name: 永恒神谴 Eternal Damnation
Eternal Damnation.description: 只要灵魂锁链保持完整，被诅咒的锻炉废料就无法被真正摧毁，并且会在下一次日落时被完全治愈，哪怕它的肉体已被摧毁也是如此。

Searing Heat.name: 灼热 Searing Heat
Searing Heat.description: 触碰被诅咒的锻炉废料的生物（包括@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒抱 Grappling}他或以无武装打击命中他）会受到[[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6火焰伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:33|basic:true]豁免）。

Forge Breath.name: 锻炉吐息 Forge Breath
Forge Breath.description:
被诅咒的锻炉废料呼出一团由刺鼻的煤灰、尘埃和灼热的余烬组成的烟云。这能影响@Template[type:cone|distance:30]区域或以被诅咒的锻炉废料为中心的@Template[type:burst|distance:20]区域，并持续[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

每个进入或在该区域开始其回合的生物将受到[[/r {12d6}[fire]]]{12d6火焰伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:36|basic:true]豁免）。

豁免失败的生物还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1分钟。烟云里的生物处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态，但对于被诅咒的锻炉废料来说无效。

直到被诅咒的锻炉废料使用鼓起风箱之前，他无法再次使用锻炉吐息。

Inflate Bellows.name: 鼓起风箱 Inflate Bellows
Inflate Bellows.description:
需求 被诅咒的锻炉废料已使用过锻炉吐息。

效果 被诅咒的锻炉废料深深地吸了一口气来补充它被清空的肺，好让它能再次使用锻炉呼吸。

Soul Chain.name: 链锁灵魂 Soul Chain
Soul Chain.description:
若有生物被灵魂锁链作出攻击的杀死，且被诅咒的锻炉废料能够保留该生物的尸体，他就能通过在锻炉边工作一日并在成功通过@Check[type:crafting|dc:20|name:Soul Chain Bind]检定来将该生物的灵魂束缚到灵魂锁链中，如同@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{缚魂术 Bind Soul}一般。

除非灵魂锁链被摧毁（硬度10，HP 40，BT 20），否则以此方式被束缚灵魂的个体无法复活。

Soul Siphon.name: 灵魂虹吸 Soul Siphon
Soul Siphon.description:
当被诅咒的锻炉废料用其灵魂锁链对目标造成重击时，它会抽走目标的有部分灵魂。目标必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

失败 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}。

大失败 目标陷入流失2并且由于痛苦而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}。

Acidic Needle Launcher.name: Acidic Needle Launcher
Acidic Needle Launcher.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:36|name:Disable Firing Mechanism|traits:mechanical,trap,complex] to disable some firing mechanisms, making three adjacent squares in the trapped area safe to enter。
Acidic Needle Launcher.hazarddescription: A ceiling-mounted launcher rains resinous needles onto intruders, after which the needles melt into acid。
Acidic Needle Launcher.routine: (3动作) The acidic needle launcher fires a needle at a random target in the area indicated on the map。

Needle Rain.name: Needle Rain
Needle Rain.description:
触发 A creature moves into the area indicated on the map

效果 The trap shoots an acidic needle at a random target in the area indicated on the map, then rolls initiative。

Aiudara Wraith.name: Aiudara Wraith
Aiudara Wraith.publicNotes: Dahak's influence in Alseta's Landing created a soul-draining effect that slays unprotected creatures within, transforming them into ghostly creatures known as aiudara wraiths, but these rare undead can rise within modern aiudara portals as well. Each time an individual travels through an aiudara, there's a chance their passage could leave a faint imprint of their subconscious in the network. Normally this imprint simply fades away, but when an aiudara is damaged or the individual is suffering from necromantic contagions, these imprints can accumulate and, in time, coalesce on the Astral Plane or within Alseta's Landing as a full-fledged aiudara wraith. The wraith is forced to live with an incomplete sense of self, always seeking its own memories and swiftly growing violent and vengeful as its quest to reclaim these ephemeral notions constantly meets with failure。

Teleportation Attachment.name: Teleportation Attachment
Teleportation Attachment.description:
触发 A creature within 60 feet uses a teleportation effect

效果 The aiudara wraith teleports with the creature, arriving in an empty space of its choice adjacent to the triggering creature's destination. If the triggering effect targets multiple creatures, the aiudara wraith chooses which creature it arrives beside。

Dimensional Shunt.name: Dimensional Shunt
Dimensional Shunt.description:
The aiudara wraith's touch displaces creatures and flings them through space. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40]豁免。

大成功 The creature is unaffected and becomes temporarily immune to dimensional shunt for 1 minute。

成功 The creature is pushed 5 feet in a random direction。

失败 The creature is teleported 20 feet in a direction of the aiudara wraith's choice。

大失败 As failure, but the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}。

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.description: When an aiudara wraith damages a living creature with its spectral hand Strike, the aiudara wraith gains 18 temporary Hit Points and the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} as long as it is drained. Further damage dealt by the aiudara wraith's spectral hand Strikes increases the value of the drained and stupefied conditions by 1 each on a failed save, to a maximum of 10 for both。

Instantaneous Movement.name: Instantaneous Movement
Instantaneous Movement.description: An aiudara wraith moves by means of localized teleportation. An aiudara wraith's Stride does not have the move trait. When an aiudara wraith Strides, it reaches its destination within the range of its Speed immediately。

Alak Stagram.name: 阿拉克·斯塔格拉姆 Alak Stagram

Intimidating Strike.name: 威慑打击 Intimidating Strike
Intimidating Strike.description: 阿拉克击碎了敌人的身体甚而信心。阿拉克进行一次近战普通攻击，如果命中并造成伤害，目标进入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}状态，若攻击大成功则进入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}状态。

Power Attack.name: 猛力攻击 Power Attack
Power Attack.description: 阿拉克在维持平衡的情况下挥出狂怒的一击。阿拉克进行一次打击时，这次攻击在累计多重攻击减值时算作两次攻击而不是一次。如果命中，武器伤害骰增加一个。

Aluum Enforcer.name: Aluum Enforcer
Aluum Enforcer.publicNotes:
The most common aluum is powered by the bound soul of a loyal city servant, but its creation is among the Pactmasters' most guarded secrets. There are dozens of dormant aluums spread throughout Katapesh, and only someone wearing an aluum charm can activate and command one of these 14-foot-tall soldiers. The Pactmasters entrust few beyond the Zephyr Guard to carry these charms, and stealing such a charm is one of the most severe crimes in the city。

Aluums are powerful metal and stone constructs originally created by the Pactmasters to maintain order in Katapesh. The construction of each aluum includes the creation of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.bU731I8njNmSAQhQ]{Aluum Charm}, a brass pendant set with a blue crystal designed to control that particular construct. The charm constructed at the same time as an aluum is called its linked charm。

Aluum Antimagic.name: Aluum Antimagic
Aluum Antimagic.description: Aluum enforcers are immune to spells and magical abilities, with two exceptions. A negative spell or magical ability grants an aluum enforcer the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened} condition until the end of its next turn instead of its normal effects. A positive spell or ability makes an aluum enforcer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn instead of its normal effects。

Paralyzing Force.name: Paralyzing Force
Paralyzing Force.description: A creature damaged by the aluum enforcer's fist Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is paralyzed for [[/r 1d4 #minutes]]{1d4 minutes } and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Soul Shriek.name: Soul Shriek
Soul Shriek.description:
The aluum enforcer emits a keening wail in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals [[/r {9d6}[sonic]]]{9d6 sonic伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|basic:true]豁免). A creature that fails its save is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3} on a critical failure。

The aluum can't use Soul Shriek again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Vulnerable to Dispelling.name: Vulnerable to Dispelling
Vulnerable to Dispelling.description: The animated dragonstorm can be targeted by disjunction and dispel magic. If targeted by such a spell of 9th level or higher, the construct loses its resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, and physical damage and is slowed 1 for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Channel Dragonstorm.name: Channel Dragonstorm
Channel Dragonstorm.description: The animated dragonstorm directs a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of dragonstorm energy. This deals [[/r {3d8}[acid] + {3d8}[cold] +{3d8}[electricity] +{3d8}[fire] +{3d8}[poison]]]{3d8 acid, 3d8 cold, 3d8 electricity, 3d8 fire, and 3d8毒素伤害} to creatures in the cone (@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true]豁免). The animated dragonstorm can't use Channel Dragonstorm again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Destructive Strikes.name: Destructive Strikes
Destructive Strikes.description: The animated dragonstorm's attacks ignore the Hardness of objects with Hardness 20 or less。

Dragonstorm Strike.name: Dragonstorm Strike
Dragonstorm Strike.description: On a critical hit, the animated dragonstorm's fist bursts with dragonstorm energy. The target takes [[/r {1d6}[acid] + {1d6}[cold] +{1d6}[electricity] +{1d6}[fire] +{1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 acid, 1d6 cold, 1d6 electricity, 1d6 fire, and 1d6毒素伤害}。

Ash Web.name: 灰网 Ash Web
Ash Web.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:27|name:Remove Patch|traits:environmental,fungus](专家)可在不触发孢子的情况下移除边长10尺方格的灰网。
Ash Web.hazarddescription: 这种乌黑色的真菌会在受到扰动时迅速释放有毒孢子。区域B2内的整个网络是一个单独的有机体。其中有9个10尺边长的方形区域需要移除，但当它承受足够多的伤害时，整个有机体便会直接死亡。
Ash Web.reset: 这一大片灰网会在每轮开始时自动重置。

Spore Explosion.name: 孢子迸发 Spore Explosion
Spore Explosion.description:
触发 有生物移动进入灰网占据的空间或者对其造成寒冷伤害之外任何类型的伤害。

需求 灰网未处于阳光的直接照射下。

效果 触发生物以及距离该生物10尺范围内的所有生物都会暴露在灰网孢子之中。

Ash Web Spores.name: 灰网孢子 Ash Web Spores
Ash Web Spores.description:
即便毒素的持续时间结束，灰网造成的力竭状态仍会持续。该状态的数值每小时降低1点。古革巨人免疫这种毒素；取而代之的是，他们会在吸入灰网后的睡眠中陷入逼真但怪异的梦境。

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {4d6}[poison]]]{4d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {6d6}[poison]]]{6d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3} (1轮)。

Bida.name: 比达龙 Bida
Bida.publicNotes:
比达龙是一种黑色鳞片的龙，有着长长的蛇形身体和蝙蝠般的翅膀。它们的腿和爪子比大多数龙都要小，但它们像蟒蛇一样强有力的身躯起伏盘绕，是致命的武器，可以一次夺走多个受害者的生命。

比达龙用它令人印象深刻的智慧和强大的魔法变成人型生物潜伏在某个定居点里。经过几周或几个月的时间之后，它会让自己成为村子里的重要成员，只有当它进一步成为社区的无价之宝时，它才会揭示为村庄提供援助的可怕代价：定期为它提供人肉和金子。从那时起，比达龙几乎只居住在它烟雾弥漫的巢穴里，靠着祭祀品的血肉不断成长。为了向外界隐藏自己的存在，比达龙会将它的奴隶聚居地隐藏在大规模的幻象中，曾经繁荣的村庄可能看起来只剩下一片树林，比达龙还会命令镇民摧毁所有进出城镇的道路。

比达龙不太能容忍它们的同类，而更喜欢与它们的小而美味的奴隶为伴。在罕见的情况下，一对比达龙可能会联手征服一个特别大的定居点，作为合作的回报，它们会从民众那里榨取更多的财富（和鲜血）。

Eight Coils.name: 八圈 Eight Coils
Eight Coils.description: 比达龙的尾巴即使已经攫抓了某个生物，依然可以用来打击。比达龙的尾巴最多一次能同时擒抱8名中型或更小体型的生物；它也可以攫抓大型生物，但一个大型生物算作4个中型生物。

Mask Settlement.name: 伪装定居点 Mask Settlement
Mask Settlement.description: 通过维持专注4小时，比达龙能隐藏一个小型定居点。此效果类似于5环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{幻景 Hallucinatory Terrain}法术，只是范围变为@Template[type:burst|distance:500]，并且范围内的生物如果进入建筑内就会被隐形。比达龙一次只能伪装一个定居点，并且在每日准备时必须花费10分钟时间维持专注，才能让幻象延续。

Black Powder Bomb.name: 黑火药炸弹 Black Powder Bomb
Black Powder Bomb.disable:
解除此类手动激活陷阱无需任何特定技能。通过一次交互动作，一名PC便能够扫除一部分黑火药并中断导火索的引燃，但这么做并不能妨碍格哈德使用大口径短枪激活陷阱。若有一桶火药被移到其他位置（无论是被扔下悬崖还是仅仅被带走）则仍具有爆炸的可能性，但3桶火药中只要有一桶不再位于触发坍塌所要求的精确位置——那么它的爆炸在此时点就仅能对适当的区域造成火焰伤害，而不会对神庙的建筑建构造成伤害通过2个动作的行动将火药倒出来。

你可以将一个桶内的内容物洒出来（最有效的方法是把火药向着悬崖一侧倾倒），也可以向桶中加入一加仑的水来让火药保持惰性，以抑制其爆炸的特性。木桶本身是可以通过造成伤害来破坏的（请注意，后文中列出的每个桶的AC已经考虑到格哈德将他们塞入到神庙地板或墙壁的角落中），但你要注意任何火焰伤害（包括火球术或者格哈德的大口径短枪这样的区域效果所附带的火焰伤害）均会导致火药桶的爆炸。根据你的选择，其他类似的行动也可以有效地解除这个危害。
Black Powder Bomb.hazarddescription: 放置在神庙关键位置的3大桶黑火药在被触发后会同时爆炸，导致整个建筑坍塌成碎石，并有一部分结构从悬崖壁上滑落。
Black Powder Bomb.routine: 如果格哈德点燃黑火药引信，它会以每轮10尺的速度燃烧；6轮后，当导火索到达小桶时，黑火药炸弹爆炸。如果他用他的大口径枪射击一个桶，炸弹会立即爆炸。
Black Powder Bomb.stealthdetails: 3个火药桶隐藏得不是很好，但不经意的观察是无法看到这些桶的。

Destructive Explosion.name: 爆破 Destructive Explosion
Destructive Explosion.description:
触发 3个木桶中的任意一个木桶承受任意火焰伤害，包括通过黑火药构成的导火索引向木桶造成的伤害。

效果 木桶爆炸，对@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]区域造成[[/r {5d6}[fire]]]{5d6火焰伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true|traits:mechanical,trap]豁免）；若有其他火药桶位于此区域内，则会立即引起连锁反应（注意按照地图所示位置被放置好的3个木桶均在触发连锁反应的范围内）。重叠区域内的火焰伤害不会累加，但当爆炸发生时如果全部3个木桶都位于初始位置的话，神庙本身便会因此而崩塌，对所有在神庙内的生物造成[[/r {8d6}[bludgeoning]]]{8d6钝击伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true|name:Temple Collapse|traits:mechanical,trap]豁免）。

Bloody Blade Mercenary.name: 血腥利刃佣兵 Bloody Blade Mercenary

Hunt Prey.name: 猎杀目标 Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description:
佣兵指定一个生物为猎杀目标，专注于攻击该生物。佣兵必须能够看到或者听到你的目标，或者在探索时追踪这一猎物。

佣兵@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seeks}猎杀目标的察觉检定上获得+2环境加值，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracks}猎杀目标的生存检定上获得+2环境加值。佣兵还会在对抗你的猎杀目标时忽略远程攻击的第二个射程增量减值。

佣兵同一时间只能指定一个猎物。如果佣兵在已经指定了一个生物之后对另一个生物使用猎杀目标，他会失去对之前生物的目标指定，而新的生物成为目标。佣兵的指定持续到第二次进行每日准备。

Hunted Shot.name: 猎杀射击 Hunted Shot
Hunted Shot.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 佣兵持用一把装填0的远程武器。

佣兵使用需求的武器对猎杀目标进行两次打击。如果两次攻击都命中了同一生物，则将攻击伤害加总后计算抗力和弱点。每次打击正常承受多重攻击减值。

Precision.name: 精准 Precision
Precision.description: 佣兵在1轮内首次命中他们的猎杀目标时，会造成[[/r {1d8}[precision]]]{1d8额外精准伤害}。

Incredible Initiative.name: Incredible Initiative
Incredible Initiative.description: Bshez gains a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls。

Fling Sand in the Eyes.name: Fling Sand in the Eyes
Fling Sand in the Eyes.description:
需求 Bshez is standing in an area with loose sand or soil。

效果 Bshez flings sand into an adjacent creature's eyes. If the target fails a @Check[type:reflex|dc:38] save, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} until the beginning of Bshez's next turn. If they critically fail, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} until the beginning of Bshez's next turn. If they succeed, they are unaffected。

Regardless of their save, they're temporarily immune until the battle ends。

Graceful Double Slice.name: Graceful Double Slice
Graceful Double Slice.description: Bshez makes two Strikes, one with each kukri, using her current multiple attack penalty. If both attacks hit, combine their damage and add any applicable effects from both weapons. This counts as one attack when calculating her multiple attack penalty。

Shield Breaker.name: Shield Breaker
Shield Breaker.description: When the target of Bshez's javelin Strike uses Shield Block, the Strike deals an additional [[/r 4d6 #Shield Breaker]]{4d6伤害} to the shield。

Weapon Master.name: Weapon Master
Weapon Master.description: Bshez has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapon she wields。

Keen Eyes.name: 锐眼 Keen Eyes
Keen Eyes.description: 卡尔蒙特敏锐的眼神能发现其他人注意不到的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}甚至@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}生物的蛛丝马迹。他在使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}动作寻找30英尺内的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}生物时，他获得+2环境加值。当攻击一个对他隐蔽或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}的对手时，对隐蔽的纯骰检定DC降为3，藏匿则为9。

Deny Advantage.name: 否决优势 Deny Advantage
Deny Advantage.description: 卡尔蒙特不会由于3级或更低等级生物的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}或夹击而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Nimble Dodge.name: 灵巧躲避 Nimble Dodge
Nimble Dodge.description:
触发 卡尔蒙特被一个你看得见的攻击者作为攻击目标；

需求 卡尔蒙特未处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.D5mg6Tc7Jzrj6ro7]{超载 Encumbered}；

卡尔蒙特灵巧地躲避了攻击的轨迹，他在对抗触发这个专长的攻击上的AC获得+2环境加值。

Quick Draw.name: 即时备战 Quick Draw
Quick Draw.description: 卡尔蒙特使用交互动作拔出一把武器，然后使用该武器进行打击。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
卡尔蒙特对措手不及的目标造成1d6额外伤害。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Surprise Attack.name: 突袭打击 Surprise Attack
Surprise Attack.description: 若卡尔蒙特使用欺骗或隐秘骰先攻，那么在战斗第一轮内，还未行动的生物对抗卡尔蒙时视同为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Site Bound.name: Site Bound
Site Bound.description:
The Echo cannot leave the clearing。

A typical ghost can stray only a short distance from where it was killed or the place it haunts. A typical limit is 120 feet. Some ghosts are instead bound to a room, building, item, or creature that was special to it rather than a location。

Rejuvination.name: Rejuvination
Rejuvination.description:
Candlaron's echo rejuvenates so long as Dahak's manifestation lives。

When a ghost is destroyed, it re-forms after [[/r 2d4 #days]]{2d4天} within the location it's bound to, fully healed. A ghost can be permanently destroyed only if someone determines the reason for its existence and sets right whatever prevents the spirit from resting。

Frightful Moan.name: Frightful Moan
Frightful Moan.description:
Candlaron's echo laments its fate, forcing each living creature within 30 feet to attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:44]豁免。

On a failure, a creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3} on a critical failure). On a success, a creature is temporarily immune to the echo's frightful moan for 1 minute.

Telekinetic Assault.name: Telekinetic Assault
Telekinetic Assault.description: The echo cries out in pain and anguish as small objects and debris fly about in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. Creatures in this area take [[/r {12d6}[bludgeoning]]]{12d6钝击伤害} subject to a @Check[type:reflex|dc:44|basic:true]豁免。

Carnivorous Crystal.name: 噬肉晶体 Carnivorous Crystal
Carnivorous Crystal.publicNotes: 噬肉晶体是一类源自土元素位面的奇特泥怪。与大多数泥怪不同，它们的身躯不是均匀的流体；相反，在它们玻璃般透明的粘稠树脂中，散布着数千个锋利的矿物结构，尽管如此，它们仍然具有和它身体的其他黏稠部分相同的灵活性和机动性。

Motion Sense.name: 运动感知 Motion Sense

Split.name: 分裂 Split
Split.description: 每当噬肉晶体受到钝击或音波的重击，或在对抗造成钝击或音波伤害的效果时豁免骰大失败时，就可能会分裂。如果噬肉晶体在受到伤害后还有至少15点生命值，它会分裂成两个相同的晶体，每个都有原来的晶体一半的生命值。当它分裂时，一个晶体留在原来占据的空间，另一个出现在一个邻接的未被占据的空间。如果没有未被占据的邻接空间，晶体会自动把生物推开来填满空间。

Subsonic Hum.name: 次声嗡鸣 Subsonic Hum
Subsonic Hum.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

在灵光范围内开始回合的生物必须成功通过@Check[type:will|dc:28]豁免否则获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Crystallize.name: 水晶化 Crystallize
Crystallize.description:
需求 晶体正包卷一个生物。

效果 被包卷的生物必须成功通过一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Crystalize]豁免，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，直到它不再被包卷。如果生物已经陷入缓慢，它开始结晶化，陷入石化状态，并被噬肉晶体放到地上。

[[/br 1d4 #hours]]{1d4小时}内，被石化的受害者粉碎，一个新的噬肉晶体从尸体中诞生。

Freeze.name: 晶化 Freeze
Freeze.description: 直到它下一次行动前，噬肉晶体看上去就像是一个普通的晶体构造物。作为一块结晶，它的欺骗和隐秘检定结果自动取40。

Razor Sharp.name: 锋锐 Razor Sharp
Razor Sharp.description: 如果一个噬肉晶体攻击命中并且d20掷出天然19，则该攻击为重击。如果19点骰面不足以命中，此能力不起效。

Caustic Vapor.name: Caustic Vapor
Caustic Vapor.disable: @Check[type:occultism|dc:36|name:Exorcise the Spirits|traits:mechanical,trap](大师)or @Check[type:religion|dc:36|name:Exorcise the Spirits|traits:mechanical,trap](大师)to exorcise the spirits
Caustic Vapor.hazarddescription: The door slams shut, and poison gas fills the room。

Breath Snatcher.name: Breath Snatcher
Breath Snatcher.description:
触发 A living creature other than an ooze spends at least 3 rounds in the room

效果 The trap activates and fills the area with caustic nightmare vapor, exposing all creatures within。

Caustic Nightmare Vapor.name: Caustic Nightmare Vapor
Caustic Nightmare Vapor.description:
Oozes are immune to this poison

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Onset 1 round

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {4d6}[acid]]]{4d6酸液伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {6d6}[acid]]]{6d6酸液伤害}, confused, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {8d6}[acid]]]{8d6酸液伤害}, confused, flat-footed, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} (1轮)

Shrieking Frenzy.name: 尖叫狂怒 Shrieking Frenzy
Shrieking Frenzy.description:
触发 The charau-ka查咯猿人的回合开始。

频率 每小时一次

效果 The charau-ka is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened} until the end of its turn, and can use the extra action to Stride or Strike. Due to its loud wailing while in a shrieking frenzy, the charau-ka can't speak and automatically critically fails all Stealth checks。

Thrown Weapon Mastery.name: 投掷武器精通 Thrown Weapon Mastery
Thrown Weapon Mastery.description: When a charau-ka throws a weapon, the weapon gains the deadly d6 weapon trait. When it throws an improvised weapon, it doesn't take the -2 penalty for using an improvised weapon, nor does it take the penalty for using that weapon to make a lethal attack instead of a nonlethal attack。

equipment-Key to Chiselrock's Prison.name: 凿石监狱的钥匙 Key to Chiselrock's Prison

Improved Knockdown.name: 精通击倒 Improved Knockdown
Improved Knockdown.description: 腐败守卫可以一击将敌人击倒在地。他们会尝试+27的单次近战打击。若此次打击命中，他们还能对其应用摔拌中的大成功效果。若他们使用的是双手近战武器（比如大锤）进行此次打击，他们能够使用武器的伤害骰来取代摔拌的大成功效果中规定的伤害骰，此外他们忽略摔拌的要求中必须空着一只手的需求。

Crucidaemon.name: Crucidaemon
Crucidaemon.publicNotes:
Of all the ways to die, crucidaemons represent perhaps one of the least desirable: death by torture. The fiend's shapely body, which appears to be sculpted from iron or mithril, belies a sinister wrath and love of inflicting pain. Crucidaemons particularly enjoy inflicting pain with their curved, serrated daggers, which are attached to their bodies via a chain that pierces each wrist。

A crucidaemon's existence is dedicated to subjecting its prey to an eternity of pain and terror. Unlike other daemons, many of which are eager to feed on mortal souls as soon as they can, the crucidaemon takes much greater pleasure in prolonging the agony of its victims. Oftentimes, a crucidaemon will inflict such torment and pain upon its prey that when the end finally comes, the victim tearfully thanks the daemon for the mercy of oblivion. An encounter with a crucidaemon that does not end with its death is far from over-crucidaemons have unequaled patience for those who dare oppose them。

Trap Dodger.name: Trap Dodger
Trap Dodger.description: Crucidaemons are all but impossible to fool with traps. Whenever a crucidaemon rolls a saving throw against a trap hazard, its degree of success is one better than it rolled。

Daemonic Trap Making.name: Daemonic Trap Making
Daemonic Trap Making.description: When the crucidaemon casts its innate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.o0l57UfBm9ScEUMW]{Glyph of Warding} spell, it can store any arcane or divine spell of an appropriate level in the glyph, even if it can't otherwise cast the spell。

Flurry of Daggers.name: Flurry of Daggers
Flurry of Daggers.description: The crucidaemon makes two chained dagger Strikes against a single target. These attacks count toward the crucidaemon's multiple attack penalty and its multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks。

Manifest Dagger.name: Manifest Dagger
Manifest Dagger.description: The crucidaemon summons a new chained dagger to replace a destroyed one. A crucidaemon's daggers can't be disarmed, and they become non-magical when severed from the daemon or upon the daemon's death。

Dahak's Shell.name: 达哈克之壳 Dahak's Shell
Dahak's Shell.disable: 摧毁每根龙之柱都会消除达哈克之壳中对应颜色的效果；只要仍有一种颜色仍在生效，标记达哈克之壳边界的柱子就不会受到伤害，但是成功通过@Check[type:thievery|dc:32|name:Disable Color|traits:magical,trap,hazard]检定，且技能熟练度至少达到了大师；或者成功使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（6环法术，反制DC30）对抗八根龙之柱之一的柱子都可以导致防御外壳（见后文）中的随机一种仍在激活状态的颜色失效[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。
Dahak's Shell.hazarddescription: 8根龙之柱的复制品围成的环带标志着一座多彩魔法能量圆顶的边界，它把整个悲痛堡垒包裹了起来。

strike-Eye Beam.name: 眼棱射线 Eye Beam
strike-Eye Beam.description: 目标承受与对应颜色的眼棱射线相同的效果，重击时，目标的豁免结果会变为更差1级的结果。

Prismatic Beam.name: 虹彩射线 Prismatic Beam
Prismatic Beam.description:
触发 有生物尝试通过贼活或者@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}来解除外壳色彩中的一种颜色且尝试失败；

效果 达哈克之壳用随机的眼棱射线打击触发生物。投掷[[/r 1d8 #Eye Beam]]来判定射线的颜色。

  1. 红色
  2. 橙色
  3. 黄色
  4. 绿色
  5. 蓝色
  6. 靛蓝色
  7. 紫色
  8. 黑色

Shell Defense.name: 防御外壳 Shell Defense
Shell Defense.description: 当有生物的肉身穿过达哈克之壳时，该生物会同时受到当前外壳中所有仍在生效的色彩能量的影响；按照后述顺序施加效果：红色、橙色、黄色、绿色、蓝色、靛蓝色、紫色、黑色。这些效果眼棱射线的效果相同，每个效果都需要独立进行豁免。

Black Eye Beam.name: 黑眼射线 Black Eye Beam
Black Eye Beam.description:
@Check[type:fortitude|dc:32|traits:hazard,trap]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 round。

失败 The target is blinded for 1 hour。

大失败 The target is blinded for 24 hours。

Blue Eye Beam.name: 黑眼射线 Blue Eye Beam
Blue Eye Beam.description:
@Check[type:fortitude|dc:32|traits:trap,hazard]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified}1轮。

失败 目标石化1小时。

大失败 目标被永久石化。

Green Eye Beam.name: 绿眼射线 Green Eye Beam

Indigo Eye Beam.name: 靛蓝眼射线 Indigo Eye Beam
Indigo Eye Beam.description:
@Check[type:will|dc:32|traits:hazard,trap]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}1轮。

失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}1轮。

大失败 目标会被龙之柱所控制，并且会时刻位于距离龙之柱60尺范围内，从所有非灰烬之爪手中保护龙之柱。在目标被控制期间，他会被龙之柱识别为灰烬之爪盟友。龙之柱同时至多控制3个目标；在达到此上限后任何在豁免中掷出大失败的目标会困惑[[/br 1d4+1 #Confused Rounds]]{1d4+1}轮作为替代。被控制的生物每隔24小时可以进行一次新的意志豁免来摆脱控制，但这么做会自动导致龙之柱再次对其使用眼棱攻击来试图再次控制目标。龙之柱被摧毁时，控制也会随之结束。

Yellow Eye Beam.name: 黄眼射线 Yellow Eye Beam

Orange Eye Beam.name: 橙眼射线 Orange Eye Beam

Red Eye Beam.name: 红眼射线 Red Eye Beam

Violet Eye Beam.name: 紫眼射线 Violet Eye Beam
Violet Eye Beam.description:
@Check[type:will|dc:32|traits:hazard,trap]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

失败 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}。

大失败 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 7}。

Dahak's Skull.name: 达哈克之颅 Dahak's Skull
Dahak's Skull.disable: 两次@Check[type:thievery|dc:27|name:Pry Out the Embedded Gems|traits:complex,magical,fire,trap,hazard](专家)可以在不触发感受器的前提下撬开嵌在颅骨眼窝深处的宝石，或者对着双眼使用两次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（4环法术；反制DC22）。
Dahak's Skull.hazarddescription: 龙类颅骨的眼窝中放着一对魔法宝石，作为范围为半径30尺的魔法感受器。
Dahak's Skull.routine: (2动作) 轮到危害的先攻时，达哈克之颅发射两道眼棱射线；每次攻击它都必须选择不同的生物作为目标。达哈克之颅不能将颅骨正下方的生物作为眼棱射线的目标。
Dahak's Skull.stealthdetails: but @Check[type:perception|dc:24|name:Notice Lights in Eyes|traits:complex,magical,fire,trap,hazard]注意到颅骨眼窝中的炽热光芒似乎在环视房间。

Perception and Vision.name: 察觉和视觉 Perception and Vision
Perception and Vision.description: 察觉 [[/r 1d20+16 #Perception]]{+16}; @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.qCCLZhnp2HhP3Ex6]{黑暗视觉 Darkvision}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{识破隐形 See Invisibility}

Dahak's Glance.name: 达哈克之瞥 Dahak's Glance
Dahak's Glance.description:
触发 一名不属于灰烬之爪成员的活物进入区域C9；

效果 达哈克之颅的眼窝对触发生物发射一次眼棱射线，之后危害投掷先攻。

Dalos.name: 火山妖 Dalos
Dalos.publicNotes:
火山妖是一类隐居的精类，居住于火山或火山道附近，形如被他们称作家的巨型火山口。他们更常居住于这些地区过热的环境中，而不是超出他们耐寒能力的“寒冷废土”中，因此他们很少在这类环境外遇到。和大多数精类一样，火山妖反复无常，报复心重。他们最讨厌被打扰，通常在径直攻击前只会扔一块烧红的石头来警告入侵者。

火山妖有25尺高，体重超过20,000磅。

Magma Splash.name: 岩浆飞溅 Magma Splash
Magma Splash.description: 每当火山妖受到近战打击伤害时，岩浆从他的开放性创口飞溅而出，粘到附近生物的身上。@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]范围内的生物必须进行@Check[type:reflex|dc:31|traits:damaging-effect]豁免。失败则因过热的岩石粘于身上后的冷却过程而受到[[/r {3d6}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}。随着岩浆冷却，结束这个持续伤害的DC在第一回合后每回合减少5。

Belch Smoke.name: 浓烟滚滚 Belch Smoke
Belch Smoke.description: 火山妖从他的头部喷出烟雾，形成一个@Template[type:burst|distance:20]的烟雾云，并漂到120尺内的一个位置。效果等同于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{隐雾术 Obscuring Mist}。

Heat Rock.name: 加热岩石 Heat Rock
Heat Rock.description:
火山妖使用交互动作从他的身体或附近的环境中取出一块岩石，然后用他内在的火焰加热它所持有的岩石，直至岩石红热。加热的岩石在远程打击中命中目标会造成额外[[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6火焰伤害}。

一旦火山妖加热一块岩石，这块岩石在冷却前能维持其热量2轮。

Lava Bomb.name: 熔岩爆弹 Lava Bomb
Lava Bomb.description:
火山妖令它头部的火山喷发，抛出大量的熔融岩石，喷发高度可达100尺。这个熔岩爆弹对其命中点@Template[type:burst|distance:20]{20尺半径}范围内的所有生物造成[[/r {6d8}[fire]+{6d8}[bludgeoning]]]{6d8火焰伤害和6d8钝击伤害}，@Check[type:reflex|dc:33|basic:true]豁免。

火山妖在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内不能再次使用此能力。

Damurdiel's Vengeance.name: Damurdiel's Vengeance
Damurdiel's Vengeance.disable: Deception 45 (legendary) to pretend to be Erveniss and ask for forgiveness, Diplomacy 45 (legendary) to convince Damurdiel to stand down (elves who are masters in Diplomacy can attempt the check as if they were legendary instead), or Religion 40 (legendary) to call upon Calistria to calm Damurdiel's spirit。
Damurdiel's Vengeance.hazarddescription: An elven woman wearing a robe stands in the water. She beckons anyone who enters the room to join her in the pool。
Damurdiel's Vengeance.reset: Damurdiel's spirit subsides once she is destroyed or if she manages to reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points. She returns after 1 minute。
Damurdiel's Vengeance.routine: (3动作) The haunt attempts to Strike with the dagger。
Damurdiel's Vengeance.stealthdetails: (legendary) or DC 47 to notice the dagger left in the pool start to move on its own。

Surprise Strike.name: Surprise Strike
Surprise Strike.description:
触发 A creature approaches within 5 feet of the pool's edge

效果 The ghostly elf causes a dagger to rise out of the waters and then fling toward the triggering creature. If the attack is a hit, it is a critical hit instead. The haunt then rolls initiative。

Deculi.name: 影蝠 Deculi
Deculi.publicNotes: 这些蝙蝠般的怪物栖息在幽暗地域的角落和缝隙中，悬挂在钟乳石上，向毫无防备的猎物猛扑下来。虽然影蝠完全不具视觉，但它们的头盖骨里还保有最基本的神经，足以让它们探测到红外光——它们用来定位潜在的食物和威胁的信息。归功于它们控制阴影起伏的魔法能力，影蝠是致命的猎手。它们更喜欢享用刚杀死的温热猎物，但被逼无奈的话也可以靠腐肉维生。

Infrared Vision.name: 红外视觉 Infrared Vision
Infrared Vision.description: 影蝠可以以精确感官侦测到红外辐射。

Create Shadow Sanctuary.name: 创造阴影庇护所 Create Shadow Sanctuary
Create Shadow Sanctuary.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 影蝠在与自己邻接的10×10尺的黑暗环境中创造一个异次元空间并进入。对于非影蝠来说，异次元空间看起来就像一个普通的黑暗区域（尽管像真视术这样的效果可以看破这层幻象）。影蝠的红外视觉功能在这个异次元空间的边界内外都正常生效，允许它感知周围正在发生的事情，其内在法术黑暗术也延伸到阴影庇护所周围的区域。来自异次元空间外部的攻击不能影响到内部，反之亦然。

影蝠能解消这个效果好从庇护所中显现，但它显现的位置必须位于黑暗内且没有障碍。如果该区域被阻塞，那么影蝠就被挤到最近的空闲空间，每被挤开5尺就受到[[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6钝击伤害}。如果复盖在阴影庇护所上的区域被魔法光源照亮，那么这个异次元空间将无法进入，而影蝠将被困在里面，直到该区域再次陷入黑暗。每日一次，影蝠可以尝试用它的内在法术黑暗术去反制光亮效果，来熄灭一个魔法光源，好再度隐藏它的庇护所。

如果一只影蝠在异次元空间死亡（因饥饿、口渴或窒息），阴影庇护所立即结束，影蝠的尸体也被逐出。如果该区域被照亮，尸体不会被逐出，直到庇护所的入口再次陷入黑暗。

Shadow Strike.name: 暗影突袭 Shadow Strike
Shadow Strike.description:
需求 影蝠正位于它的阴影庇护所内。

效果 影蝠解消它的阴影庇护所。它行走，攀爬，或飞行至多它速度的距离，然后进行一次尖牙打击，造成额外[[/r {4d6}[precision]]]{4d6精准伤害}。

Walk in Shadow.name: 阴影行者 Walk in Shadow
Walk in Shadow.description: 当影蝠躲藏于阴影之中并进行潜行技能动作时，它可以以全速而非半速移动。

Dmiri Yoltosha.name: 狄米利·尤托莎 Dmiri Yoltosha

equipment-Key to Chest.name: 箱子钥匙 Key to Chest

Flurry.name: 连击 Flurry
Flurry.description: 狄米利在对抗她的猎杀目标时，第2次攻击的多次攻击减值为-3（灵巧武器为-2），第3次或后续攻击的多次攻击减值为-6（灵巧武器为-4）。

Hunt Prey.name: 猎杀目标 Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description:
狄米利指定一个生物为猎杀目标，专注于攻击该生物。狄米利必须能够看到或者听到你的目标，或者在探索时追踪这一猎物。

狄米利@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seeks}猎杀目标的察觉检定上获得+2环境加值，@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{追踪 Tracks}猎杀目标的生存检定上获得+2环境加值。狄米利还会在对抗猎杀目标时忽略远程攻击的第二个射程增量减值。

狄米利同一时间只能指定一个猎物。如果狄米利在已经指定了一个生物之后对另一个生物使用猎杀目标，他会失去对之前生物的目标指定，而新的生物成为目标。狄米利的指定持续到第二次进行每日准备。

Hunter's Aim.name: 猎手瞄准 Hunter's Aim
Hunter's Aim.description: 当狄米利专注于瞄准时，攻击将变得无比精准。狄米利进行一次对猎杀目标的远程打击，她在这次打击的攻击骰上获得+2环境加值，并且忽略猎物的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态。

Twin Parry.name: 双重招架 Twin Parry
Twin Parry.description:
需求 狄米利正持有2柄近战武器，每柄需在不同手中。

狄米利使用两柄武器来格挡攻击。直到她下回合开始，她在AC上得到+1环境加值，若两柄武器中至少一柄有格挡特征，则为+2环境加值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.eu2HidLHaGKe4MPn]{效果: 双重招架}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.EDpjey6SCdvIYqEc]{效果: 双重招架 (格挡特征)}

Twin Takedown.name: 双重攻击 Twin Takedown
Twin Takedown.description:
频率 每轮一次

需求 狄米利分别用不同的手持用两把近战武器。

狄米利快速用两把武器攻击猎杀目标，各对猎杀目标进行一次打击。如果两次攻击击中了同一猎物，则将攻击伤害加总后计算抗力和弱点。狄米利的每次打击正常承受多重攻击减值。

Doorwarden.name: 守门者 Doorwarden
Doorwarden.publicNotes:
守门者最初是精灵发明的构装体。乍看之下，这些守卫看起来完全像是一扇华丽钢铁或秘银大门，但当入侵者试图通过的时候，守门者就会变形成强壮而熟练的士兵，并把门板作为高耸的盾牌来使用。

警觉的冒险者有时能在守门者变形之前就依靠蛛丝马迹察觉到它们：门板上通常会有圆形的凸起或像盾牌那样方便抓握的把手，门楣通常是一个握着长剑剑柄的手臂，可以向下伸出以阻止别人进入。最初的守门者由精灵发明，它们身着精灵盔甲和奥尔塞塔（Alseta）风格的金属面具。其他文明会则用自己的文化主题装饰守门者，并且有可能使用它们自己族裔偏好的武器，例如矮人的守门者会用矮人战斧。

守门者有时会对自己看守的房间有所了解，它们也会和进门者交流，尤其是精灵。但是试图说服守门者离开门口是行不通的；它被绑定在需要看守的门上，并且会保护它直到被摧毁为止。

Reactive Shield.name: 反射持盾 Reactive Shield
Reactive Shield.description:
触发 一个敌人以近战打击命中守门者；

效果 守门者瞬间@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{举起盾牌 Raise its Shield}，它针对此次触发打击的AC得到盾牌加值。

Shield Block.name: 盾牌格挡 Shield Block
Shield Block.description:
当守门者对5尺内的敌人进行盾牌格挡时，它还能将对方推离5尺。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ShieldBlock]

Imitate Door.name: 拟门 Imitate Door
Imitate Door.description: 直到再次行动之前，守门者能让自己看起来像一扇门。它伪装成门的欺骗检定和DC自动取31。

Slam Doors.name: 关门 Slam Doors
Slam Doors.description: 守门者的门砰地一声合上，对同一个生物进行两次门板打击。如果两次打击都命中，目标生物被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}（夹在两扇门中间）。守门者的多重攻击减值在两次打击都完成后才会增加。

Dragon Pillar.name: 龙之柱 Dragon Pillar
Dragon Pillar.disable: @Check[type:athletics|dc:26|name:Push the Pillar Over|traits:complex,magical,trap,hazard](专家)来推倒龙之柱，或@Check[type:thievery|dc:26|name:Erase Magic Runes|traits:complex,magical,trap,hazard](专家)清除龙之柱上赋予其能量的魔法符文，或者@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（4环；反制DC22）来解除龙之柱上的魔法。
Dragon Pillar.hazarddescription: 10尺高的木柱顶端为达哈克头颅的木雕。每根龙之柱的头部都被涂成了不同的颜色，具体颜色如特殊遭遇描述中所叙述的一致，但不管龙头是何种颜色，总是会有一缕黑烟从其口中冒出。
Dragon Pillar.reset: 一旦龙之柱在范围内识别不到合适的目标，便会关闭并重置。
Dragon Pillar.routine: (1动作) 轮到龙之柱行动时，它会对120尺范围内最近的目标射出眼棱射线。

Recognize Ally.name: 识别盟友 Recognize Ally
Recognize Ally.description: 龙之柱能够通过它那空洞的眼窝视物，而且它能识别灰烬之爪及其盟友。易容为灰烬之爪的PC可以愚弄龙之柱，通过使用欺骗进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{乔装 Impersonate}可以让它将角色识别为灰烬之爪盟友。龙之柱总是会使用察觉来判定先攻。

Perception and Vision.name: 察觉和视觉 Perception and Vision

Dragon Pillar Glance.name: 龙柱凝视 Dragon Pillar Glance
Dragon Pillar Glance.description:
触发 龙之柱看到120尺内的一个生物，且该生物未被识别为灰烬之爪或者灰烬之爪盟友。

效果 龙之柱作出眼棱射线打击对抗触发生物，之后投掷先攻。

Black Eye Beam.name: 黑眼射线 Black Eye Beam
Black Eye Beam.description:
@Check[type:fortitude|dc:24|traits:hazard,trap]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1轮。

失败 目标目盲1小时。

大失败 目标目盲24小时。

strike-Eye Beam.name: 眼棱射线 Eye Beam
strike-Eye Beam.description: 效果 目标根据龙之柱的颜色成为对应效果的受术者。重击时，目标的豁免结果变为更差一级的结果。

Blue Eye Beam.name: 蓝眼射线 Blue Eye Beam
Blue Eye Beam.description:
@Check[type:fortitude|dc:24|traits:trap,hazard]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified}1轮。

失败 目标石化1小时。

大失败 目标永久石化。

Green Eye Beam.name: 绿眼射线 Green Eye Beam

Indigo Eye Beam.name: 靛蓝眼射线 Indigo Eye Beam
Indigo Eye Beam.description:
@Check[type:will|dc:24|traits:hazard,trap]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}1轮。

失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}1轮。

大失败 目标会被龙之柱所控制，并且会时刻位于距离龙之柱60尺范围内，从所有非灰烬之爪手中保护龙之柱。在目标被控制期间，他会被龙之柱识别为灰烬之爪盟友。龙之柱同时至多控制3个目标；在达到此上限后任何在豁免中掷出大失败的目标会困惑[[/br 1d4+1 #Confused Rounds]]{1d4+1}轮作为替代。被控制的生物每隔24小时可以进行一次新的意志豁免来摆脱控制，但这么做会自动导致龙之柱再次对其使用眼棱攻击来试图再次控制目标。龙之柱被摧毁时，控制也会随之结束。

Yellow Eye Beam.name: 黄眼射线 Yellow Eye Beam

Orange Eye Beam.name: 橙眼射线 Orange Eye Beam

Red Eye Beam.name: 红眼射线 Red Eye Beam

Violet Eye Beam.name: 紫眼射线 Violet Eye Beam
Violet Eye Beam.description:
@Check[type:will|dc:24|traits:hazard,trap]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

失败 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}。

大失败 目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 7}。

Dragonscarred Dead.name: 龙疤亡者 Dragonscarred Dead
Dragonscarred Dead.publicNotes:
并非所有英勇牺牲的准屠龙者都能于传奇(的编年史)中安息。有时，一位陨落的敌人给龙类死灵师留下的印象是如此深刻，以至于龙用仪式唤醒死去的战士，让他以不死之躯为其服务。这些亡灵守卫被注入了杀死他们的龙的部分力量，它们引导着与它们的龙类主人的吐息相同的能量。

龙疤亡者与骷髅勇士或死墓骑士相似，因为它们不仅仅是复活来盲目服从命令的仆从，而是强大的守护者，保有它们生前的力量。龙疤亡者们常常被魔法强迫着听从它的复活者的命令，但这些不死的屠龙者中有一部分设法摆脱了它们的主人，转而追寻他们自己的卑鄙使命——这可能包括召集盟友再次挑战它们的龙类创造者，从而完成它们生前就开始的可怕任务。

Guardian Sense.name: 守卫感官 Guardian Sense
Guardian Sense.description: 龙疤亡者会立即察觉到任何闯入其龙类创造者的巢穴的入侵者。它不知道入侵者的确切位置，但仍然知道入侵者的存在，直到入侵者离开或被摧毁。

Breath-Seared Sword.name: 龙息巨剑 Breath-Seared Sword
Breath-Seared Sword.description: 龙疤亡者的武器经过了龙的吐息魔法炙烤。当被生前就携带它的龙疤亡者使用时，这把剑会造成额外的[[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6负能量伤害}和[[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害}。在其他任何生物手中，它只是一把破损巨剑。

Glare of Rage.name: 目光如炬 Glare of Rage
Glare of Rage.description:
龙疤亡者将其无尽的挫败感凝聚于它的双眼，然后将视线投向30尺内它能看到的一个生物。该生物必须进行@Check[type:will|dc:30]豁免。

大成功 此生物不受影响。

成功 此生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

失败 此生物获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned}1轮。

大失败 此生物震慑[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}，并陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}。

Dragonshard Guardian.name: Dragonshard Guardian
Dragonshard Guardian.publicNotes: Created by Mengkare and powered by a shard of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.L8OButuVM3PFxgrZ]{Orb of Gold Dragonkind}, this construct is made of sculpted crystal draped in a beautiful gold filigree frame。

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The construct breathes in one of two ways, then can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

- Flame (arcane, evocation, fire) A blast of flame deals [[/r {15d10}[fire]]]{15d10火焰伤害} to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:45|basic:true]豁免). This fire damage does not harm objects or constructs。

- Weakening Gas (arcane, necromancy) A cloud of gold-flecked gas forces each creature in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] to attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:45] save; the effect lasts 1 minute。

大成功 The creature is unaffected。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}。

失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 5}。

大失败 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 8}。

Reverberating Revenge.name: Reverberating Revenge
Reverberating Revenge.description:
触发 The dragonshard guardian takes cold, fire, electricity, or sonic damage from a non-dragonshard guardian source

效果 The dragonshard guardian's body absorbs the energy entirely, preventing the damage from harming the construct. Its body reverberates and transforms the absorbed energy before projecting it outward in a @Template[type:burst|distance:60]。

Each creature within the burst takes an amount of fire damage equal to the amount of energy damage absorbed by the triggering attack, including any damage resisted by the guardian's resistances and additional damage from its weakness (@Check[type:reflex|dc:45|basic:true]豁免)。

This fire damage doesn't harm objects or constructs。

Dragonstorm.name: Dragonstorm
Dragonstorm.disable: The dragonstorm can't be disabled-only endured. It ends only once the attack on Breachill and Citadel Altaerein is over。
Dragonstorm.hazarddescription: A massive storm stirs in the skies above Breachill and Citadel Altaerein. As specific events begin during the three waves of the manifestation's retribution, the dragonstorm wreaks localized havoc。

Localized Dragonstorm.name: Localized Dragonstorm
Localized Dragonstorm.description:
触发 A new wave begins

效果 Roll [[/r 1d10]] to determine which effect manifests from the following possibilities. The placement of these effects is guided by Dahak's will, and they should manifest in the most detrimental locations possible to the PCs。

1-2 Acid Rain.name: 1-2 Acid Rain
1-2 Acid Rain.description: A torrent of acid drenches creatures in a 20-foot burst. Creatures in the area take [[/r {6d10}[acid]]]{6d10酸液伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true]豁免). Creatures that critically fail also take [[/r {5}[persistent,acid]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续酸液伤害}。

3-4 Freezing Wind.name: 3-4 Freezing Wind
3-4 Freezing Wind.description: A barrage of freezing wind and hail assaults all creatures in a 20-foot burst. Creatures in the area take [[/r {3d10}[cold]]]{3d10 cold伤害} and [[/r {3d10}[bludgeoning]]]{3d10钝击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true]豁免). Creatures that critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 round。

5-6 Bolts of Lightning.name: 5-6 Bolts of Lightning
5-6 Bolts of Lightning.description: Several bolts of lightning strike all creatures in a 20-foot burst. Creatures in the area take [[/r {6d10}[electricity]]]{6d10电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true]豁免). Creatures that critically fail their saves become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for 1 round。

7-8 Flaming Vortex.name: 7-8 Flaming Vortex
7-8 Flaming Vortex.description: Gouts of flame fall on all creatures in a 20-foot burst. Creatures in the area take [[/r {6d10}[fire]]]{6d10火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true]豁免). Creatures that critically fail their saves also take [[/r {5}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}。

9-10 Poison Miasma.name: 9-10 Poison Miasma
9-10 Poison Miasma.description: Poisonous mist rolls forth, covering a 20-foot burst for 1 round. Creatures within the mist become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}, and creatures outside it become concealed to creatures within it. Creatures within the mist take [[/r {6d10}[poison]]]{6d10毒素伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:42|basic:true]豁免). Creatures that critically fail their saves become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}。

Dragonstorm Blade.name: Dragonstorm Blade
Dragonstorm Blade.description: The dragonstorm fire giant raises one hand to the sky, channeling dragonstorm energy into the blade held in the other. The giant makes a greatsword Strike with a -2 circumstance penalty against each creature within its reach. It makes only one attack roll and compares the result against each creature's AC. This Strike deals an additional [[/r {1d8}[acid]]]{1d8 acid}, [[/r {1d8}[cold]]]{1d8 cold}, [[/r {1d8}[electricity]]]{1d8 electricity}, [[/r {1d8}[fire]]]{1d8 fire}, and [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8毒素伤害} and counts as two attacks for the giant's multiple attack penalty。

Duergar Slave Lord.name: 灰矮人猎奴领主 Duergar Slave Lord

equipment-Key to the Temple of All Gods.name: 万神殿的钥匙 Key to the Temple of All Gods

Improved Evasion.name: 精通反射闪避 Improved Evasion
Improved Evasion.description: 当灰矮人猎奴领主在反射豁免检定中投掷成功时，他们能得到大成功的结果作为替代。当他们在反射豁免检定中投掷出大失败时，则会得到失败的结果作为替代。最后，当他们在对抗伤害效果的反射豁免中失败时，会承受半额伤害。

Hunt Prey.name: 猎杀目标 Hunt Prey
Hunt Prey.description:
猎奴领主指定单个他们能够看到或听到或正在追踪的生物为猎物。他们在搜索猎物的察觉检定中获得+2 环境加值，在追踪猎物的生存检定中获得+2环境加值。他们还会在对抗猎物作出的远程攻击中忽略第二个射程增量的减值。

猎奴领主在一轮内首次命中他们的猎物时，会造成[[/r {2d8}[precision]]]{2d8额外精准伤害}。猎奴领主在同一时间内只能指定一名猎物。

Hunter's Flurry.name: 猎手连击 Hunter's Flurry
Hunter's Flurry.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 猎奴领主作出两次弓打击或者两次近战打击，每次打击要使用不同的武器。这些打击必须以猎奴领主的猎物为目标。若两次打击都命中了，则在判断抗力和弱点时将两者的伤害合并起来计算。

Echoes of Betrayal.name: 背叛的回响 Echoes of Betrayal
Echoes of Betrayal.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:35|name:Exorcise|traits:haunt,complex](大师)3次以驱除这些鬼魂或者交涉@Check[type:diplomacy|dc:39|name:Talk Down|traits:haunt,complex](专家)3次以说服他们。
Echoes of Betrayal.hazarddescription: 恶毒的鬼魂们在形如拉蒂卡的幽灵带领下出现并开始一场致命的争斗。这些鬼魂会试图压倒活物的意识，迫使他们也参与到这场战斗中。
Echoes of Betrayal.reset: 在24小时后，作祟会归来。只有当萨戈拉克（或寇夫拉）合法任命的法官进入到监狱之中，并且在承受作祟的伤害后，从攻击中幸存下来，这些鬼魂才能得到永久的安息。
Echoes of Betrayal.routine: (1动作) 以一个动作，作祟会促使一系列鬼魂从墙壁、地板和天花板中出拳揍人。作祟尝试幽冥之拳打击对抗区域H10内的每个生物。
Echoes of Betrayal.stealthdetails: (大师) 以听到愤怒鬼魂的安静低语

Confuse.name: 陷入困惑 Confuse
Confuse.description:
触发 至少3个生物进入区域H10。

效果 作祟操弄监狱内的所有生物，用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LiGbewa9pO0yjbsY]{困惑术 Confusion}（8环，@Check[type:will|dc:37]豁免）影响他们。

strike-Spectral Fist.name: 幽冥之拳 Spectral Fist
strike-Spectral Fist.description: 命中时该生物必须尝试一次新的@Check[type:will|dc:37|name:Spectral Fist Confusion]豁免对抗@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.LiGbewa9pO0yjbsY]{困惑术 Confusion}（若该生物目前还未陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}）。

Ekujae Guardian.name: 艾库雅守护者 Ekujae Guardian

Double Slice.name: 双重切割 Double Slice
Double Slice.description: 艾库雅守护者作出两次打击对抗相同的目标，分别用他们的两把匕首作出。艾库雅守护者将命中攻击的伤害合并，再应用一次精准伤害、抗力以及弱点。两次攻击均被记入艾库雅守护者的多重攻击减值，但多重攻击减值的增加在两次攻击都作出后才会应用。

Woodland Stride.name: 穿林步 Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.description: 艾库雅守护者忽略由植物造成的困难地形。

Contingency.name: Contingency
Contingency.description:
触发 Emaliza is attacked

效果 A 5th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door} spell is cast on Emaliza; she uses this to escape an attack that she fears would incapacitate or kill her。

Drain Bonded Item.name: 汲取连接物品 Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 Emaliza hasn't acted yet on this turn

效果 Emaliza can cast one prepared spell she has already cast today without spending a spell slot。

Warded Casting.name: Warded Casting
Warded Casting.description:
频率 每轮一次

触发 Emaliza Casts a Spell

效果 Emaliza's magic creates a small defensive aura around her. She gains 20 temporary Hit Points and resistance 20 to either acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage. The defensive aura remains until the beginning of her next turn。

Emperor Bird.name: 帝皇雀 Emperor Bird
Emperor Bird.publicNotes:
帝皇雀栖息在芒吉莽原那广袤的丛林中，它们由于其灿烂的羽毛和天生的魔力而闻名。尽管帝皇雀通常以蜥蜴、大型昆虫以及其他小型生物为食，但它的领地意识极强，会毫不畏惧地向着更大的猎物发动攻击。帝皇雀的喙异常锋利，形状与体型比它小很多的孔雀相似，但它最致命的武器却是其尾部——帝皇雀的尾羽中隐藏着宛如鞭子一样长长的骨片，这对于任何敢于悄悄靠近它的捕食者来说可谓是一个可怕的惊喜。

帝皇雀获得现在这个名字的时间大约在2000年前，塔尔多的第六批探索军团深入芒吉莽原的时候。当军队的士兵发现这种身长6 尺，尾巴、翅膀和羽冠上生有五彩斑斓的羽毛的鸟类时，认为这种鸟的造型与其高贵的帝王相配，便忽略了芒吉人用了数个世代的名字——贝巴奇鸟。

饲养帝皇雀曾经在许多年里都是塔尔多贵族间威望的象征。但那已经是很久之前的事情了，而饲养帝皇雀也不再流行。这些艳丽宠物的原主人不可避免地忘记了它们，数百只无人照管的帝皇雀被疲惫的仆人们放生野外。尽管许多被放生的鸟儿在阿维斯坦那陌生的林地内迅速死去，但也有一些设法活了下来，至今你仍旧可以在瓦杜兰森林内遭遇到帝皇雀。

帝皇雀会使用他那灿烂且测彩斑斓的羽毛在交配中进行展示，也会用于恐吓其他交配竞争者以及潜在的捕食者。它们的羽毛不仅艳丽，而且还具有魔力——这一事实引起了法师和炼金术师的兴趣，他们中的许多人花费数十年捕捉和饲养帝皇雀，希望能够揭开蕴含其中的奥秘之谜。芒吉莽原的施法者会为这些庄严生物身上的完整羽毛而支付一大笔钱——或者更好的是，一头活着的样本。

Dazzling Display.name: 绚烂之羽 Dazzling Display
Dazzling Display.description:
帝皇雀拍打它那让人致幻的双翼。@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]{15尺}内的每个能够看到帝皇雀的生物都必须尝试@Check[type:will|dc:19]豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮。

失败 该生物目眩[[/br 1d4 #Dazzled Duration]]{1d4轮}。

大失败 该生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}[[/br 1d4 #Confused Duration]]{1d4轮}。

Tail Lash.name: 尾扫 Tail Lash
Tail Lash.description: 帝皇雀对触及范围内的两个不同生物作出尾扫打击。直至帝皇雀的完成这两次攻击之前，它的多次攻击减值不会增加。

Endless Elven Aging.name: Endless Elven Aging
Endless Elven Aging.hp: per square (squares must be destroyed to disable the haunt 6)
Endless Elven Aging.disable: @Check[type:occultism|dc:38|name:Calm the Restless Energies|traits:haunt,magical](大师)or @Check[type:religion|dc:38|name:Calm the Restless Energies|traits:haunt,magical](大师)to calm the restless energies and suppress the haunt for 1 hour; a critical success deactivates the haunt permanently。
Endless Elven Aging.hazarddescription: A haunted mural fascinates characters and swiftly drains their vitality。
Endless Elven Aging.reset: The haunt continues its routine until there are no targets within 30 feet of the room. It then resets over the course of 1 minute and is able to activate again。
Endless Elven Aging.routine: (2动作) The haunt lures creatures into area A2 using Captivate. Any actions it hasn't used to Captivate are used to drain a living creature in the room with Live a Thousand Lives。

Lifelike Scintillation.name: Lifelike Scintillation
Lifelike Scintillation.description:
触发 A living creature examines the mural or enters the room

效果 The haunt activates and rolls initiative。

Captivate.name: Captivate
Captivate.description:
The faintly moving images compel one creature within 30 feet of the room to move into the room. The creature attempts a @Check[type:will|dc:38|traits:charm]豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 The target must spend all its actions on its next turn moving into the room, and is then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} until the end of its next turn。

大失败 As failure, and the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for 1 minute。

Live a Thousand Lives.name: Live a Thousand Lives
Live a Thousand Lives.description:
The haunt causes a living creature in the room to experience a full elven life, weathering every wound, misfortune, loss, and consequence of aging centuries in a matter of seconds. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}。

失败 The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (or its drained value increases by 1, to a maximum of drained 3), and it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} until the end of its next turn。

大失败 As failure, but the target also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} (or its doomed value increases by 1)。

Lazurite-Infused Flesh.name: 青金灌注之躯 Lazurite-Infused Flesh
Lazurite-Infused Flesh.description: 法洛克的肉身被注入了青金，他总是会获得不死生物从此类物质中获取的好处。当他身处充满青金的区域时，比如饥民密所，这些好处会得到提升，使得他在对抗正能量效果的豁免中获得+3环境加值。此种灌注还让法洛克获得了对抗正能量伤害的抗力。

Opportune Backstab.name: 适时背刺 Opportune Backstab
Opportune Backstab.description:
触发 位于法洛克的近战触及范围内的生物被法洛克的盟友作出的近战攻击命中。

效果 当法洛克的敌人被他的盟友命中时，他会利用敌人分神的时机，对触发生物作出一次打击。

Stench.name: 恶臭 Stench
Stench.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

若有生物进入灵光范围或者在回合开始时位于灵光范围内，则必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]豁免，失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}（若为大失败，则只要处于恶心状态就还会附加@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}）。

身处灵光之内时，生物在对抗疾病以及从恶心状态中恢复的豁免检定中会承受-2环境减值。成功豁免的生物会获得1分钟的临时免疫。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.wX9L6fbqVMLP05hn]{效果: 恶臭}

Consume Flesh.name: 啃食尸体 Consume Flesh
Consume Flesh.description:
需求 法洛克与刚死亡1小时内的生物尸体相邻。

效果 法洛克吞食一大块尸体并恢复[[/r {8d6}[healing]]]{8d6生命值}。

他从每具尸体上只能获取一次生命值恢复。

Ghast Fever.name: 妖鬼热 Ghast Fever
Ghast Fever.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]

阶段1 携带病原但没有不良效果 (1天)

阶段2 [[/r {3d8}[negative]]]{3d8负能量伤害}且从任何治疗获得的生命值恢复均减半 (1天)

阶段3 如阶段2 (1天)

阶段4 [[/r {3d8}[negative]]]{3d8负能量伤害}且无法从治疗获得任何好处 (1天)

阶段5 如阶段4 (1天)

阶段6 死亡，并在下一日的午夜以@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.VC7rtYR4hLxwg7WZ]{妖鬼 Ghast}复生

Paralysis.name: 麻痹 Paralysis
Paralysis.description: 任何被法洛克的攻击命中的活物必须成功通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]豁免，失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}。被麻痹的生物可以在自己的每个回合结束时尝试一次新的豁免，每次此豁免的DC都会递减1点。

Scoundrel.name: 无赖 Scoundrel
Scoundrel.description: 当法洛克成功进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feints}后，目标在对抗他尝试的近战攻击时会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}，持续至他的下个回合结束为止。在大成功时，目标会在对抗所有近战攻击时陷入措手不及，持续至他们的下个回合结束为止，而非仅仅是法洛克的回合结束。

Swift Leap.name: 迅捷跳跃 Swift Leap
Swift Leap.description: 法洛克跳跃至多为自身速度一半的距离。这次移动不会触发反应动作。

Forge-Spurned.name: 锻炉废料 Forge-Spurned
Forge-Spurned.hp: 永恒神谴, 负能量治疗
Forge-Spurned.publicNotes: 那些没能达到灰矮人之神卓斯卡的严苛标准的邪恶矮人们，有时会被变成名为锻炉废料的不死憎恶逐回物质世界。

equipment-Soul Chain.name: +1强击炽焰灵魂锁链 Soul Chain
equipment-Soul Chain.description:
这种4英尺的链条附着倒钩，一端或两段都有尖刺。有些会配置金属环作为握把。

一位锻炉废料挥舞着一条灵魂锁链：一条被诅咒的+1强击炽焰刺链。任何持有灵魂锁链的生物每天日落时必须成功通过@Check[type:will|dc:22|name:Soul Chain Transformation]豁免，否则将被永久转化为锻炉废料。一个失去了灵魂锁链的锻炉废料会不惜一切代价去找回它。

Enternal Damnation.name: 永恒神谴 Enternal Damnation
Enternal Damnation.description: 只要它的灵魂锁链保持完整，一个锻炉废料就无法被真正摧毁。它会在下一次日落时完全愈合，哪怕它的肉体已被摧毁。

Searing Heat.name: 灼热 Searing Heat
Searing Heat.description: 触碰锻炉废料的生物（包括@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒抱 Grappling}或无武装打击）受到[[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害}，@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true]豁免。

Forge Breath.name: 锻炉吐息 Forge Breath
Forge Breath.description:
锻炉废料呼出一团由刺鼻的煤灰、尘埃和灼热的余烬组成的烟云。影响范围为@Template[type:cone|distance:30]或一个@Template[type:burst|distance:20]，并持续[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

每个进入或在该区域开始其回合的生物将受到[[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6火焰伤害}，@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true]豁免。豁免失败的生物也会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1分钟。

烟云里的生物处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态，但对于锻炉废料可不是。

直到它使用鼓起风箱前，锻炉废料不能再使用锻炉吐息。

Inflate Bellows.name: 鼓起风箱 Inflate Bellows
Inflate Bellows.description:
需求 锻炉废料已使用过锻炉吐息。

效果 锻炉废料深深地吸了一口气来补充它被清空的肺，好让它能再次使用锻炉呼吸。

Soul Chain.name: 链锁灵魂 Soul Chain
Soul Chain.description:
如果一个生物被灵魂锁链攻击杀死，而锻炉废料能够保留该生物的尸体，它就能通过在锻炉边一天的工作和一个成功的@Check[type:crafting|dc:20|name:Soul Chain Bind]检定来将该生物的灵魂束缚到灵魂锁链中（如同@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{缚魂术 Bind Soul}）。

以这种方式被束缚灵魂的个体不能复活，除非灵魂锁链被摧毁（硬度5，HP 20，BT 10）。

Gerhard Pendergrast.name: 格哈德·彭德格拉斯特 Gerhard Pendergrast

Whiplash.name: 鞭笞 Whiplash
Whiplash.description:
触发 有生物在距离格哈德10尺范围内使用带有移动特征的动作来离开一个方格。

效果 格哈德尝试对触发生物使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}。成功时，该生物还会承受伤害，就如同格哈德使用他的长鞭进行打击一般，若触发生物此时正在飞行，他会下坠30尺。

Manly Left Hook.name: 男子汉左勾拳 Manly Left Hook
Manly Left Hook.description: 被格哈德的拳头命中的生物必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]豁免，失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}，大失败时则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}。

Shoddy Blunderbuss.name: 劣质大口径短枪 Shoddy Blunderbuss
Shoddy Blunderbuss.description:
格哈德用他的大口径短枪进行爆炸射击，对@Template[type:cone|distance:30]区域内的所有生物造成[[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]+{2d10}[fire]]]{4d6钝击伤害和2d10火焰伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true]豁免）。

在用大口径短枪射击后，格哈德必须成功通过@Check[type:crafting|dc:20]或@Check[type:engineering-lore|dc:20]{工程学识}检定，否则武器就会爆炸，对格哈德造成与锥形区域内的生物相同数值的伤害，并且摧毁枪支自身。若格哈德之外的其他人使用该武器，则必须在此检定中大成功才行。若有人事先检查该武器的话，成功通过@Check[type:crafting|dc:22]检定足够得知该武器的不稳定性。

重新装填大口径短枪需要3个交互动作：添加1份火药，添加1份霰弹筒，最后把这些东西在枪管里压实。

Whip Swing.name: 皮鞭摆荡 Whip Swing
Whip Swing.description:
需求 格哈德位于丛林、茂密森林或者头顶上有很多横梁的区域。

效果 格哈德用他的长鞭抽打并缠绕在半空中的枝干上；之后沿直线摆荡至多30尺距离，他必须在坚实的地面上结束移动，否则便会坠落。

Gloomglow Mushrooms.name: 暗光蕈 Gloomglow Mushrooms
Gloomglow Mushrooms.disable: @Check[type:survival|dc:22|name:Clear Patch of Mushrooms|traits:environmental,fungus,hazard](专家)可以在不触发菌类的前提下整理出5尺宽的通路。
Gloomglow Mushrooms.hazarddescription: 一片草地一般的真菌周遭是一簇簇发着微光的长柄蕈类。

Glowing Spores.name: 发光孢子 Glowing Spores
Glowing Spores.description:
触发 有生物移动进入菌类所处的空间或者伤害菌类。若伤害类型为寒冷，菌类便无法使用此反应动作。

效果 触发生物和所有距离菌类10尺之内的生物均会被让人发痒、分身和发光的孢子所喷射，必须尝试@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|traits:environmental,fungus,hazard]豁免。豁免失败时，该生物会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}以及@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，大失败时则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，同时还会在隐秘检定上承受-4减值，直至孢子在24小时内失去效力或者被清理掉为止。冲洗掉孢子需要沐浴在水中1分钟、使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Qw3fnUlaUbnn7ipC]{魔法伎俩 Prestidigitation}法术，或者其他GM允许的类似方式。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.eZL4B1P4H8hr1CAn]{效果: 发光孢子}

Grauladon.name: 垢鳄龙 Grauladon
Grauladon.publicNotes:
垢鳄龙是一种凶猛的猎食者，它的外形犹如鳄鱼，但实际上是龙类的遥远分支。它们会在恶臭池塘的滩涂或较大水体的偏僻角落筑巢，通常位于乡村地区的沼泽或林地内。垢鳄龙的行为几乎完全被自身的食欲所驱使，大部分时间里它都会在水下悠闲地游弋，寻找鱼类或者水禽作为猎物。垢鳄龙与它们的龙类表亲一样贪婪，经常会捕猎超出自身需求的大号猎物，之后便会守在尸体旁边，哪怕尸体已经腐烂也不会把肉分给食腐生物。典型的垢鳄龙体长按照从鼻尖到尾巴尖计算约有16尺，体重约为1500磅。

垢鳄龙的体臭看起来好像由于超自然的力量而让人恶心，但其实只是它那腐臭的栖息地外加以腐烂、浸水的肉类作为主要食物的结果。由于垢鳄龙喷出的气体和龙类的喷吐有些许相似之处，因此乡村居民给它起了个“淤泥龙兽”的外号。

你可以在大多数温带气候的水体内找到垢鳄龙，淡水或淡咸水皆有可能。它们更喜欢在浅滩筑巢，尤其是在芦苇或者其他植物可以遮挡它们庞大身躯，并由此来让猎物难以察觉自身的地方。垢鳄龙有很强的领土意识，无法容忍其他掠食者在其家园周边生活或狩猎。

Reactive Breath.name: 反应吐息 Reactive Breath
Reactive Breath.description:
触发 垢鳄龙受到来自相邻生物的伤害。

效果 垢鳄龙使用恶臭吐息，此次吐息包含触发生物所在的区域。

Body Slam.name: 猛力摆尾 Body Slam
Body Slam.description:
需求 与垢鳄龙相邻的敌人多于1名。

效果 垢鳄龙对每个相邻的敌人摆动尾巴，并且对每个与自身相邻的生物尝试摔绊 。此能力仅需要投掷单次运动检定，并将其结果与每个目标的强韧DC进行比较。

Noxious Breath.name: 恶臭吐息 Noxious Breath
Noxious Breath.description:
垢鳄龙发出嘶嘶声并对着@Template[type:cone|distance:15]区域释放出令人作呕的恶臭云雾。区域内的每个生物都必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]豁免检定，失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}（大失败时则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}）。

垢鳄龙在[[/br 1d4 #Noxious Breath Cooldown]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用恶臭吐息或者反应吐息。

Graveshell.name: 墓壳兽 Graveshell
Graveshell.publicNotes:
墓壳兽是一种危险的猎食者，它会使用一种病态的诱饵来诱使食腐生物和探险者进入爪子所及的范围——在它那宛如乌龟的外壳上伸出的尖刺所贯穿的上一任受害者的尸身。除了它的外壳之外，这种怪物和已知的动物没有任何相似之处。小而明亮的黄色眼睛从下垂的头部中向前注视着，它最显著的特征是形状奇特、满是尖牙的嘴部被扭曲的样子好似一直在微笑一般。它那粗壮的四肢既不适合行走，也不适合游泳，但肢体前端那些复盖着藻类的爪子却是致命的武器。

墓壳兽很聪明——这是让许多遭遇这种生物的人都会感到惊讶的事实——它不会战斗致死，而是会选择投降。这些怪物没有可以拿来交换自身性命的财务，不过他们收集的尸体上的浸水宝藏也许能够满足机会主义者。

equipment-Shell.name: 外壳 Shell
equipment-Shell.description: 墓壳兽的外壳有6点硬度，10点生命值，破损阈值为5。若外壳破损，墓壳兽便无法使用外壳尖刺攻击，也无法使用缩壳动作。若外壳被摧毁，墓壳兽的AC会降低至16。只要墓壳兽还活着，它的外壳就会在一周后自行修复。

Corpse Disguise.name: 尸体伪装 Corpse Disguise
Corpse Disguise.description: 墓壳兽会把尸体（通常是类人生物的尸体）固定在自己背壳的尖刺上，之后再将部分身体浸入水中，从而在数分钟内隐藏自己的真实样貌。此行为在伪装为漂浮在水中的尸体时，欺骗检定的自动结果和DC均为22点。

Shell Block.name: 外壳格挡 Shell Block
Shell Block.description:
触发 墓壳兽在躲回自己的壳里之后由于物理攻击而承受伤害；

效果 墓壳兽使此次伤害降低，降低数值等同于自身外壳的硬度。墓壳兽的外壳有6点硬度，10点生命值，破损阈值为5。若外壳破损，墓壳兽便无法使用外壳尖刺攻击，也无法使用缩壳动作。若外壳被摧毁，墓壳兽的AC会降低至16。只要墓壳兽还活着，它的外壳就会在1周后自行修复。

Shell Game.name: 缩壳 Shell Game
Shell Game.description: 墓壳兽躲回自己的壳里，AC获得+2环境加值，并允许它使用外壳格挡。这会持续至墓壳兽移动、或者使用任何外壳尖刺之外的攻击手段进行攻击为止。墓壳兽的壳若陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{破损 Broken}则无法使用此动作，也不会由自己的壳而获得任何收益。

Grippli Archer.name: Grippli Archer
Grippli Archer.publicNotes:
Frog-like humanoids who make their homes in the treetops of tropical jungles and forests, gripplis are uniquely adapted to their environment. Their oversized eyes give them keen vision in both light and dark, and their large toes allow them to easily scale the trees atop which they reside. Gripplis vary widely in physical appearance, their physiologies largely determined by their surrounding environment; those who live in verdant forests, for example, typically have bright green skin and red eyes. In contrast, gripplis who live in regions of rot and decay have mottled brown coloration, and those who dwell near lakes or streams may bear bright blue and orange stripes. Typical gripplis are just over 2 feet tall and weigh approximately 30 pounds。

Whatever region they come from, gripplis tend to be peaceful hunter-gatherers. Due to their modest understanding of agriculture, gripplis don't raise crops in the traditional sense, although they do cultivate mushroom patches and gather a wide array of fruits from the surrounding wilderness. The jungle also contains rivers and lakes filled with silver-scaled fish, which gripplis harvest in a sustainable manner to ensure their future supply, as well as fatty insects that grow much larger than in other parts of the world. Some of the most advanced grippli societies capture and breed these insects, nurturing herds of giant dragonflies or beetles that are eventually slaughtered for food for the rest of the village. Particularly enterprising gripplis even seek out and tame huge flying insects to use as mounts during their hunts. The rearing of such massive insects is no easy feat, however, so gripplis who manage to do so are often heralded as local heroes。

The treetop settlements of the grippli are difficult to spot from the forest floor. Gripplis obscure their holdings with broad leaves and thick branches, and they riddle the surrounding forest with labyrinthine trails that only they know how to navigate. Their villages are usually constructed among the densest populations of trees, with thin rope bridges strung between wide wooden platforms built around each trunk。

These sharpshooters are renowned for their patience and their accuracy。

Hail of Arrows.name: Hail of Arrows
Hail of Arrows.description: The grippli archer makes three ranged Strikes with their shortbow, all against a single target. Combine the damage of any Strikes that hit for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses。

Jungle Stride.name: Jungle Stride
Jungle Stride.description: A grippli ignores difficult terrain in forests and jungles。

Grippli Greenspeaker.name: Grippli Greenspeaker
Grippli Greenspeaker.publicNotes:
Frog-like humanoids who make their homes in the treetops of tropical jungles and forests, gripplis are uniquely adapted to their environment. Their oversized eyes give them keen vision in both light and dark, and their large toes allow them to easily scale the trees atop which they reside. In contrast, gripplis who live in regions of rot and decay have mottled brown coloration, and those who dwell near lakes or streams may bear bright blue and orange stripes. Typical gripplis are just over 2 feet tall and weigh approximately 30 pounds。

Whatever region they come from, gripplis tend to be peaceful hunter-gatherers. Due to their modest understanding of agriculture, gripplis don't raise crops in the traditional sense, although they do cultivate mushroom patches and gather a wide array of fruits from the surrounding wilderness. The jungle also contains rivers and lakes filled with silver-scaled fish, which gripplis harvest in a sustainable manner to ensure their future supply, as well as fatty insects that grow much larger than in other parts of the world. Some of the most advanced grippli societies capture and breed these insects, nurturing herds of giant dragonflies or beetles that are eventually slaughtered for food for the rest of the village. Particularly enterprising gripplis even seek out and tame huge flying insects to use as mounts during their hunts. The rearing of such massive insects is no easy feat, however, so gripplis who manage to do so are often heralded as local heroes。

The treetop settlements of the grippli are difficult to spot from the forest floor. Gripplis obscure their holdings with broad leaves and thick branches, and they riddle the surrounding forest with labyrinthine trails that only they know how to navigate. Their villages are usually constructed among the densest populations of trees, with thin rope bridges strung between wide wooden platforms built around each trunk。

The unofficial healers of gripplikind are known as greenspeakers。

Green Empathy.name: Green Empathy
Green Empathy.description: The greenspeaker can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on and make very simple Requests of plants and fungi。

Jungle Stride.name: Jungle Stride
Jungle Stride.description: A grippli ignores difficult terrain in forests and jungles。

Hellcrown.name: 地狱亡冠 Hellcrown
Hellcrown.publicNotes:
地狱骑士的生命通常血腥残酷又短暂。许多为地狱骑士团服务而死亡的人，在如此忠心耿耿的奉献之后，通常会享受安眠，但也有一些人即使死后也要继续为地狱骑士团工作。当某个地狱骑士被斩首时，偶尔会变成被叫做地狱亡冠的幽灵般的不死生物。地狱亡冠在战场上和废弃的城堡里出没，杀死他们遇到的所有人。地狱亡冠是一种奇怪的灵魂与钢铁的融合体，它没有实体，而是寄宿在生前为之自豪的头盔上。前地狱骑士的脊椎散发出的阴影像披风一样挂在头盔下面，更为这个生物的外表增添了几分恐怖。地狱骑士对地狱亡冠的态度是厌恶又尊敬的，认为这些变成漂浮的不死生物的人虽然意志坚定，但是身体羸弱。

地狱亡冠通常会在它的身体死亡数小时或更长时间内显现，并且只有在它的身体无人看管的情况下才会显现；如果地狱骑士在一场大型战役中丧命，这甚至需要几天的时间。通常情况下，转化的地狱亡冠不会保留其生前的任何人格碎片，但在极少数情况下，地狱亡冠可能保留生前记忆，并且对杀死自己的人怀有满腔怨恨。无论他们是保留着生前的记忆，还是已经失去了以前所有的自我意识，地狱亡冠会徘徊于他们的死亡之地，并向遭遇的任何人彰显骑士团的残酷的法则。

Bleeding Nail.name: 流血之钉 Bleeding Nail
Bleeding Nail.description: 如果地狱亡冠的尖钉打击命中敌人，目标必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:16]检定。一旦失败，尖钉钉入目标身体，目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}，持续1分钟，并且还受到[[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害}。（大失败则@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，并且@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d4.success]）。每多钉入一枚钉子，力竭状态值+1（最大力竭4），并且流血伤害+1。生物可以以一个交互动作来拔出钉子，这能减少力竭状态值和流血伤害。拔出最后一颗钉子就可以消除上述两种状态。

Terrifying Stare.name: 恐惧凝视 Terrifying Stare
Terrifying Stare.description: 所有能看见地狱亡冠并且受到流血之钉效果影响的生物，必须通过@Check[type:will|dc:16]检定，否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}，并且如果大失败，在惊惧状态持续时间内还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}。任何通过豁免的生物都在10分钟内对该能力临时免疫。

Grasping Hands.name: Grasping Hands
Grasping Hands.description: The mutant's various hands stretch and reach out in an attempt to grab nearby creatures. The mutant attempts an Athletics check to Grapple all creatures within 10 feet. The mutant's multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until it has made all the Athletics checks that are part of its Grasping Hands. Creatures that are grabbed are pulled to a space adjacent to the mutant. This is forced movement。

Kobold Explosives.name: 狗头人爆弹 Kobold Explosives
Kobold Explosives.description:
开销 一份灌注试剂。

效果 黑泽尔快速地调配出1 枚爆弹并将其掷出30 尺远。所有位于半径@Template[type:burst|distance:5]区域内的生物均会承受[[/r {5d6}[fire]]]{5d6火焰伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true|traits:interact]豁免）。

Smoky Retreat.name: 逃脱烟雾 Smoky Retreat
Smoky Retreat.description:
开销 一份灌注试剂。

需求 黑泽尔必须至少与一名敌人相邻。

效果 黑泽尔向着她所占据空间的一个角落投掷出特殊的粉状混合物，在半径@Template[type:burst|distance:5]区域内创造出一股烟雾，这股能让她@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}的烟雾会持续至她的回合结束为止。之后他立即@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneaks}，但她必须在与任何敌人均不相邻的空间内结束这次移动。

黑泽尔之外的所有生物若在烟雾之中则必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

失败 该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

大失败 该生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 3}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

Staff Mastery.name: 法杖专精 Staff Mastery
Staff Mastery.description: 尽管黑泽尔无法施法，但她对火焰的痴迷以及长期的练习使得自己能够通过火焰法杖来施放法术，就如同这些法术在她的法术列表中且她有能力施放这些法术一般。她必须如常消耗法杖中的充能；当她每天早上准备法杖时，可以为法杖储存4发充能。

Drain Bonded Item.name: 汲取连接物品 Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 Ilgreth hasn't acted yet on this turn

效果 Ilgreth can cast one prepared spell he has already cast today without spending a spell slot. He must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements。

Overwhelming Energy.name: Overwhelming Energy
Overwhelming Energy.description: If Ilgreth's next action is to Cast a Spell, the spell ignores 20 resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage。

Ilssrah Embermead.name: 伊斯拉·恩伯米德 Ilssrah Embermead

equipment-Fleshroaster.name: +2强击炽焰烤肉钩 Fleshroaster
equipment-Fleshroaster.description: 这种4英尺的链条附着倒钩，一端或两段都有尖刺。有些会配置金属环作为握把。

Efficient Capture.name: 高效抓捕 Efficient Capture
Efficient Capture.description:
需求 伊斯拉手上持握手铐，并且和一名生物相邻。

效果 伊斯拉尝试用手铐束缚该生物的手腕或脚踝。若伊斯拉成功通过[[/r 1d20+30 #attack]]{+30}调整值的攻击检定对抗目标的AC，则对其应用手铐。

Hammer the Chained.name: 链锤合击 Hammer the Chained
Hammer the Chained.description:
伊斯拉以烤肉钩尝试一次近战打击。如果命中，她能立即抽出她的轻锤，用它对相同目标再进行一次打击，然后立即将轻锤插回腰带中。然后她重新持握烤肉钩。两次打击都计算伊斯拉的多重攻击减值，但是多重攻击减值在两次打击都完成后才会增加。如果轻锤打击命中，它正常造成伤害并且目标必须尝试@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35]豁免。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1轮。

失败 生物陷入笨拙1和呆滞1，持续1分钟。

大失败 生物陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，持续1分钟。

Immortal Ichor.name: Immortal Ichor
Immortal Ichor.publicNotes: An immortal ichor is an intelligent mass of blood from a dead evil deity. The cultists who perform the ritual to create immortal ichor typically seal up the sentient ooze in an underground or remote chamber that blocks its magical abilities, but over time these seals break or weaken, freeing the unholy monster。

Immortality.name: Immortality
Immortality.description: The immortal ichor doesn't age, nor does it need to eat or breathe. It can die only as a result of violence。

Corrupt Ally.name: Corrupt Ally
Corrupt Ally.description: A creature that fails to save against an immortal ichor's charm spell becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}. The stupefied value reduces by 1 every 24 hours. The first time each day a creature stupefied by the ichor's charm fails to save against another casting of the ichor's charm, the value of the condition increases by [[/r 1d4]]{1d4}. If the stupefied condition ever equals the creature's Wisdom score, it becomes controlled by the ichor permanently; if it dies, it rises the next round as a zombie (of the GM's choice) under the ichor's control. If the ichor is killed, these zombies are destroyed。

Dead Spells.name: Dead Spells
Dead Spells.description: An immortal ichor can cast an initial and advanced domain spell of a domain that belonged to the dead deity from which the ichor arose (the domain spells presented here are from the destruction domain)。

Mental Erosion.name: Mental Erosion
Mental Erosion.description: A creature hit by the ichor's pseudopod is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for 1 day unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:will|dc:35]豁免。

Resanguinate.name: Resanguinate
Resanguinate.description: The immortal ichor draws blood from the pores of living creatures around it. Any living creature within 30 feet that has blood takes [[/r {4d6}]]{4d6伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:33|basic:true]豁免). The immortal ichor regains HP equal to the total damage dealt. A creature that fails its save is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} on a critical failure)。

Infused Items.name: Infused Items
Infused Items.description:
Ingnovim carries

4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.GttLYMT2welSpwCd]{Acid Flask (Major)}

4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.cLZrOihPht5M7eTw]{Alchemist's Fire (Major)}

2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.nS75vsM3x5jxlUqn]{Bestial Mutagen (Major)}

4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.rpbbfkexLhtadBDV]{Bottled Lightning (Major)}

4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.4DJQID8GIlxQ7b9C]{Frost Vial (Major)}

2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.1kNp6yOS0aZPBPzZ]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)}

4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.qK964kZz1ALcysOa]{Elixir of Life (True)}

These items last for 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations。

Inject Unstable Mutagen.name: Inject Unstable Mutagen
Inject Unstable Mutagen.description:
触发 Ingnovim damages a creature with a syringe Strike

效果 The creature injected with unstable mutagen must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41] save to resist the injection。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

失败 The target's body shifts and mutates, growing difficult to control; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} for 24 hours。

大失败 The target's body completely distorts into a shuddering blob of warped flesh that is incapable of action; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}. Every 24 hours, the target may attempt a new saving throw against this effect; on a critical success, the paralysis ends。

Mutagenic Adaptation.name: Mutagenic Adaptation
Mutagenic Adaptation.description: Ingnovim's body has adapted to the constant use of his mutagens. He does not suffer the drawback of any bestial mutagens but is still affected normally by other mutagens。

Quick Bomber.name: Quick Bomber
Quick Bomber.description: Ingnovim draws an alchemical bomb with an Interact action and throws it as a ranged Strike。

Death Throes.name: Death Throes
Death Throes.description:
When one of Ingnovim's assistants dies, it bursts open in a foul-sounding and smelling explosion of toxic viscera and poisonous vapors. All creatures within a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38] save to resist this blast of poison。

/n/n

大成功 The creature is unaffected。

成功 The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}。

失败 The creature takes [[/r {7d8}[poison]]]{7d8毒素伤害}。

大失败 The creature takes [[/r {14d8}[poison]]]{14d8毒素伤害}和@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Poison2d8.success]。

Attack of Opportunity.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Inizra can use Attack of Opportunity when a creature within her reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to its normal trigger. She can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and she disrupts actions on any hit, not just a critical hit。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Boundless Reprisals.name: Boundless Reprisals
Boundless Reprisals.description: Inizra gains a reaction at the start of each enemy's turn that she can use only during that turn。

Mirror Shield.name: Mirror Shield
Mirror Shield.description:
需求 You have a shield raised。

触发 An opponent casting a spell that targets you critically fails a spell attack roll against your AC。

效果 You reflect the spell back against the triggering opponent. Make a ranged attack against the triggering creature using your highest proficiency with a ranged weapon. If you can cast spells, you can make a spell attack roll instead. If you succeed, your opponent takes the effects of a successful spell attack roll for their own spell (or the effects of a critical success if your attack roll was a critical success)。

Paragon's Guard Stance.name: Paragon's Guard Stance
Paragon's Guard Stance.description: Inizra always has her shield raised as if she had used the Raise a Shield action, as long as she meets that action's requirements。

Weapon Supremacy.name: Weapon Supremacy
Weapon Supremacy.description: Inizra is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened 1}. She can use her extra action only to Strike。

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
Ishti can take on the appearance of a Medium humanoid. This doesn't change her Speed or her attack and damage modifiers with her Strikes, but it does prevent them from using her cursed touch. Ishti has a fixed humanoid form-they cannot adopt a different appearance each time they use this ability, and the appearance resembles that of their upper torso when in their true form。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Matriarch's Caress.name: Matriarch's Caress
Matriarch's Caress.description:
Ishti touches a creature, who must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:40] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} if it critically fails)。

If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 (or 2 if it critically fails) (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours。

Poison Weapon.name: Poison Weapon
Poison Weapon.description: Ishti applies a poison to a piercing or slashing weapon of her choice。

Quick Dervish Strike.name: Quick Dervish Strike
Quick Dervish Strike.description: Ishti makes a dagger attack against each enemy within reach. Each attack counts toward her multiple attack penalty, but the penalty does not increase until after all the attacks. The first enemy she damages is subject to matriarch's caress。

Divine Providence.name: 神意 Divine Providence
Divine Providence.description:
触发 贾希在对抗一个敌人的效果时，意志豁免检定的结果为成功。

效果 贾希用大成功替代成功的结果。

Glimpse of Redemption.name: 救赎瞥视 Glimpse of Redemption
Glimpse of Redemption.description:
触发 敌人对距离贾希15尺范围内的盟友造成伤害。

效果 敌人必须从后述效果中选择1 项：盟友不会受触发伤害，或者盟友对触发伤害获得10点抗力且敌人在直至自身的下个回合结束为止陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}。

Woodland Stride.name: 穿林步 Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.description: 贾希忽略由植物造成的困难地形。

Kelda Halrig.name: 凯尔达·哈利瑞格 Kelda Halrig

Master Smith.name: 锻造大师 Master Smith
Master Smith.description: 作为寇夫拉技艺最为精湛的铁匠，凯尔达锻造技巧远超一般铁匠。她在制造物品时视为16级角色。此外，她还掌握着大量各种物品的制造方法，其中包括众多罕见的公式和一部分稀有的公式。她到底掌握哪些具体公式取决于PC团队的实际需求，但大多数都是武器、护甲或其他能用锻炉打造的物品。

Counterspell.name: 反制法术 Counterspell
Counterspell.description:
触发 有生物施放一个哈拉尔王已经准备的法术。

效果 哈拉尔王消耗一个已经准备的法术来反制触发生物的施放的与之相同的法术。他可以在之后尝试解除触发法术。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: 在哈拉尔王被摧毁24 小时后，身体会在他自己的王座上重塑（若王座也被摧毁的话，则会在王座曾经所处的位置重塑），这类似于巫妖通过自身的命匣重获躯体。若萨戈拉克的所有建筑都被摧毁，或者英雄们在拯救萨戈拉克的过程中表现出色，哈拉尔王就会失去该能力。

Steady Spellcasting.name: 稳定施法 Steady Spellcasting
Steady Spellcasting.description: 若其他生物的反应动作将要打断哈拉尔王的施法，哈拉尔王必须尝试@Check[type:flat|dc:15]检定，若检定成功，法术就不会被打断。

Intimidating Attack of Opportunity.name: 破胆借机 Intimidating Attack of Opportunity
Intimidating Attack of Opportunity.description:
柯劳葛恩的借机攻击不仅会伤害生物，还能够击碎他们的自信心。若柯劳葛恩的借机攻击命中并造成伤害，目标会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}，若造成重击则会使目标陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 4}。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Fearsome Brute.name: 骇人蛮勇 Fearsome Brute
Fearsome Brute.description: 当柯劳葛恩攻击已经陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}的生物时，他的伤害会获得环境加值，其数值等同于目标的惊惧值的3倍。

Lazurite-Infused Stone Golem.name: 青金灌注石魔像 Lazurite-Infused Stone Golem

Golem Antimagic.name: 魔像抗魔 Golem Antimagic
Golem Antimagic.description:
被伤害：寒冷和正能量（[[/r {5d10}]]{5d10伤害}，区域及持续伤害为[[/r {2d8}]]{2d8伤害}）；被治疗：负能量（区域[[/r {2d8}[healing]]]{2d8生命值}）；被减速：土

魔像免疫法术和魔法能力，魔像自身所拥有的除外。但是每种魔像都会被少数几个特定法术以特殊方式影响。这些效果在魔像的具体数据里会以缩写的方式给出，这里则是详细解释。如果列出的条目包含多种类型（例如“寒冷和水”）则这些类型的法术都能对魔像产生影响。

  • 被伤害 Harmed By 任意该种类的魔法以该魔像为目标时，都能对该魔像造成所列伤害（该伤害无伤害类型），并取代原本的法术效果。如果魔像开始回合时位于该种类型的范围魔法效果中，或受到该种魔法的持续性效果影响，则受到括号内所标明的伤害值。
  • 被治疗 Healed By 任意该种类的魔法以该魔像为目标时，都能解除该魔像的缓慢效果并治疗魔像相当于法术伤害一半的HP。如果魔像开始回合时位于该种类型的范围魔法效果中，则获得括号内所列的生命值。
  • 被减速 Slowed By 任意该种类的魔法以该魔像为目标时，都能让魔像陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，持续[[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6轮}，并取代原本的法术效果。如果魔像开始回合时位于该种类型的范围魔法效果中，则魔像在该轮中陷入缓慢1。
  • 法术弱点 Vulnerable To 每种魔像都会有针对某一种或几种特定的法术的弱点，具体效果会描述在数据中。

Necrotic Field.name: 暗蚀场 Necrotic Field
Necrotic Field.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

在魔像的暗蚀场范围内的正能量效果所能造成的正常伤害减半。此外，所有在该灵光范围内的不死生物会在天生攻击中额外造成[[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6负能量伤害}。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.kjP0J97hhoIhbF3M]{效果: 暗蚀场}

Vulnerable to Stone to Flesh.name: 法术弱点：解除石化 Vulnerable to Stone to Flesh
Vulnerable to Stone to Flesh.description: 对石魔像施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Pr1ruNTbzGn3H9w5]{解除石化 Stone to Flesh}法术能使魔像抗魔和物理抗力无效化，持续1轮。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.znv4ECL7ZtuiagtA]{石化术 Flesh to Stone}能立即逆转此效果。

Inexorable March.name: 势不可挡 Inexorable March
Inexorable March.description:
石魔像以满速度行走，推开路径空间上的所有生物。如果他们试图阻止魔像，就会受到伤害。

一个生物可以尝试通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]检定来阻挡其前进。如果豁免大成功，则阻挡的生物不受伤害；在其他情况下该生物受到石魔像的拳击伤害。

Necrotic Affliction.name: 苦痛暗蚀 Necrotic Affliction
Necrotic Affliction.description:
触发 魔像命中缓慢的生物。

效果 该生物必须成功通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:34]豁免，失败则会由于魔像身上的青金吸取生命能量并导致伤口溃烂而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，大失败则为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}。

Necrotic Pulse.name: 暗蚀律动 Necrotic Pulse
Necrotic Pulse.description:
每个位于半径@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]区域的生物都必须成功通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:32|name:Necrotic Pulese]豁免，失败则会承受[[/r {1d6}[persistent,necrotic]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续负能量伤害}并且由于肌肉与骨头的暂时萎缩而在1分钟内陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

魔像在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用暗蚀律动。

Lesser Dragonstorm.name: Lesser Dragonstorm
