Lesser Dragonstorm.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:40|name:Call for Divine Intervention] (legendary) to call out to a non-evil deity for direct intervention to disperse the lesser dragonstorm (prayers to Apsu allow characters who are masters in Religion to attempt the check as if they were legendary instead), @Check[type:thievery|dc:42|name:Deactivate Vengegate|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to deactivate Vengegate while the manifestation is forcing it open, or a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (10th level; DC 40) to counteract the lesser dragonstorm。
Lesser Dragonstorm.hazarddescription: A small-scale version of a dragonstorm-a churning vortex of wind infused with fire, acid, lightning, poison, and ice-fills Alseta's Ring。
Lesser Dragonstorm.routine: (1动作) On its initiative, the lesser dragonstorm reaches out and blasts all creatures within Alseta's Ring. Affected creatures take [[/r {2d8}[acid] + {2d8}[cold] + {2d8}[fire] + {2d8}[electricity + {2d8}[poison]]]{10d8伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:46|basic:true]), evenly split between acid, cold, fire, electricity, and poison. Creatures that fail their save are pulled 20 feet toward the center of Alseta's Ring (or are knocked prone and pulled 30 feet on a critical failure). After 10 rounds, the lesser dragonstorm is destroyed, but a much greater dragonstorm manifests in the surrounding region-see The Dragonstorm。

Manifest Lesser Dragonstorm.name: Manifest Lesser Dragonstorm
Manifest Lesser Dragonstorm.description:
触发 A creature attempts to activate Vengegate

效果 The chamber within Alseta's Ring fills with a dragonstorm. Creatures within this area take [[/r {2d8}[acid] + {2d8}[cold] + {2d8}[fire] + {2d8}[electricity + {2d8}[poison]]]{10d8伤害}, equally split between acid, cold, electricity, fire, and poison。

Smoke Vision.name: Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: Smoke doesn't impair a red dragon's vision; it ignores the concealed condition from smoke。

Redirect Energy.name: Redirect Energy
Redirect Energy.description:
触发 A creature within 100 feet casts an acid, cold, fire, electricity, or poison spell, or such a spell otherwise comes into effect from a source within 100 feet

效果 The manifestation of Dahak makes all the choices to determine the targets, destination, or other effects of the spell, as though it were the caster。

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The manifestation of Dahak breathes a blast of dragonstorm energy that deals [[/r {5d6}[acid] + {5d6}[cold] +{5d6}[electricity] +{5d6}[fire] +{5d6}[poison]]]{5d6 acid, 5d6 cold, 5d6 electricity, 5d6 fire, and 5d6毒素伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:46|basic:true|name:Dragonstorm Breath|traits:fire,acid,cold,electricity,poison]豁免)。

It can't use Dragonstorm Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order。

Draconic Momentum.name: Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a Strike。

Manipulate Energy.name: Manipulate Energy
Manipulate Energy.description: The manifestation attempts to take control of a magical acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison spell within 100 feet. If it succeeds at a counteract check (counteract level 10, counteract modifier [[/r 1d20+36 #Manipulate Energy]]{+36}), the original caster loses control of the spell, control is transferred to the manifestation, and the manifestation counts as having Sustained the Spell with this action (if applicable). The manifestation can end the spell instead of taking control, if it chooses。

Lifeleech Crystal Patches.name: 吸血水晶 Lifeleech Crystal Patches
Lifeleech Crystal Patches.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:30|name:Lifeleech Crystal Patch Disable|traits:environmental,magical](专家)以通过祈祷来彻底平息水晶中死灵法术对于鲜血的渴求。
Lifeleech Crystal Patches.hazarddescription: 尖锐、嗜血的水晶使得穿过这个洞穴的行为变得十分危险。
Lifeleech Crystal Patches.stealthdetails: (专家)或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gpzpAAAJ1Lza2JVl]{侦测魔法 Detect Magic}能注意到死灵能量弥漫在水晶之中。

Slice Legs.name: 割腿削肉 Slice Legs
Slice Legs.description:
触发 体内有血液的生物移动穿过一团吸血水晶。

效果 水晶在该生物行走时扭曲并进行挥砍、活化并进行切割，造成[[/r {5d8}[slashing]]]{5d8挥砍伤害}。该生物必须尝试@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|traits:damaging-effect,environmental,magical]豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受全额伤害并且陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。

失败 该生物承受双倍伤害并且陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}。

大失败 同失败，外加该生物的血液会导致新水晶的生长。一团新的10尺方格的吸血水晶生长与现有这团水晶相邻的空间内。

Living Sap.name: 活体树液 Living Sap
Living Sap.publicNotes:
芒吉莽原高大的分叉树从肿胀的树干中渗出金色的汁液，暴露在空气中后会凝结。这些具有苦味的有毒树脂可以保护树木免受食草昆虫和其他动物的侵害，但在极少数情况下——通常是在暴露在正能量或第一世界影响之下地区——树液获得了自己的生命。这种“活体树液”是一种无意识的泥怪，它会试图扼杀和吞噬几乎任何移动的东西，从以它的母体树木为食的虫子和小野兽，到不幸偶然路过的更大的生物。由于其免疫对大多数形式的物理损害及其对母体树的保护，活体树液对那些依赖树液制造树脂、橡胶和胶水的社区来说是一种困扰。

居住在丛林中的炼金术士，例如树蛙人，因其独特的粘合特性特别珍视这种树液。几个世纪以来，树液一直被用来制作绊足包、胶水和硬化树脂。从炼金术的角度来看，从活体树液中收集来的残留物更加令人趋之若鹜。虽然收集活体树液是非常危险的，但一些炼金术士会冒着死亡的风险（如果不是他们亲自上，那就是雇佣的热心的冒险者），以获取这些加工原料。为了增加成功收获的几率，这些雇主通常愿意提供攻击上的帮助，例如次等霜冻瓶；活体树液的猎手们很久以前就知道寒冷伤害对这些生物有奇效，并且幸运的是这不会损害最后需要收集的试剂。

Motion Sense 60 feet.name: 运动感知60尺
Motion Sense 60 feet.description: 活体树液能通过周围的振动和空气扰动感知到周围的运动。

Adhesive Body.name: 粘性躯体 Adhesive Body
Adhesive Body.description: 以近战武器打击命中活体树液的生物，必须通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:24]豁免，否则该武器被卸武。如果生物大失败，该武器会落在活体树液所占据的空间内。以非武装打击命中活体树液的生物，必须通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:24]豁免，否则被活体树液@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}，直到它的下一回合结束。

Engulf.name: 包卷 Engulf
Engulf.description:
@Check[type:reflex|dc:22|traits:damaging-effect]豁免，[[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6 acid}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} DC 24，破裂10

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

Entangling Residue.name: 缠裹残液 Entangling Residue
Entangling Residue.description: 被活体树液伪足打击命中的生物，必须成功通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:24]豁免鉴定，否则被活体树液@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}，直到活体树液的下回合结束。

Luminous Ward.name: Luminous Ward
Luminous Ward.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:40|name:|traits:action:disable-a-device](大师)to disable the wards or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 38) to counteract the ward
Luminous Ward.hazarddescription: A burst of radiance explodes from the door。

Radiant Explosion.name: Radiant Explosion
Radiant Explosion.description:
触发 A creature touches the door

效果 All creatures within 20 feet of the door are scorched with brilliant light, taking [[/r {20d6}[fire]]]{20d6火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true]豁免). A creature that fails this save is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 hour (or permanently on a critical failure)。

strike-Cinderclaw Gauntlet.name: 灰烬之爪拳套 Cinderclaw Gauntlet

Channel Smite.name: 导能打击 Channel Smite
Channel Smite.description:
开销 花费一个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{伤害术 Harm}或者@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}。

马拉伦克通过一次近战攻击，将毁灭性的正能量或者负能量灌入敌人。

他进行一次近战普通攻击，并将法术的伤害加到普通攻击的伤害上。如果马拉伦克花费伤害术，这是负能量伤害；如果花费治疗术，这是正能量伤害。如果他攻击失手，或者命中了一个不会被该类型能量伤害的生物（例如用治疗术命中了非不死生物），花费该法术不产生任何效果。

Shrieking Frenzy.name: 暴怒尖啸 Shrieking Frenzy
Shrieking Frenzy.description:
触发 查喀猿人的回合开始。

频率 每小时一次

效果 查喀猿人获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}，持续至他的回合结束为止，他可以使用额外动作行走或打击。由于在暴怒尖啸期间，查喀猿人会大声尖啸，所以此时查喀猿人无法说话而且会在所有隐秘检定中自动大失败。

Thrown Weapon Mastery.name: 精通投掷武器 Thrown Weapon Mastery
Thrown Weapon Mastery.description: 当查喀猿人投掷一件武器时，该武器获得致命d6武器特征。若他投掷的是临时武器，他不会由于使用临时武器而承受-2减值，也不会由于使用该武器作出致命攻击以取代非致命攻击时而承受减值。

Imprisoned.name: Imprisoned
Imprisoned.description: Dahak's manifestation can't physically exit the Adamantine Fen until conditions are right. Planar travel effects do not allow it to escape, nor can they banish it from the Adamantine Fen。

Smoke Vision.name: Smoke Vision
Smoke Vision.description: Smoke doesn't impair a red dragon's vision; it ignores the concealed condition from smoke。

Dragonstorm Aura.name: Dragonstorm Aura
Dragonstorm Aura.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

[[/r {2d6}[acid] + {2d6}[cold] +{2d6}[electricity] +{2d6}[fire] +{2d6}[poison]]]{10d6 damage split evenly between acid, cold electricity, fire, and poison}。

Redirect Energy.name: Redirect Energy
Redirect Energy.description:
触发 A creature within 100 feet casts an acid, cold, fire, electricity, or poison spell, or such a spell otherwise comes into effect from a source within 100 feet

效果 The manifestation of Dahak makes all the choices to determine the targets, destination, or other effects of the spell, as though it were the caster。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order。

Draconic Momentum.name: Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a Strike。

Dragonstorm Breath.name: Dragonstorm Breath
Dragonstorm Breath.description: The manifestation of Dahak breathes a blast of dragonstorm energy that deals [[/r {5d6}[acid] + {5d6}[cold] +{5d6}[electricity] +{5d6}[fire] +{5d6}[poison]]]{5d6 acid, 5d6 cold, 5d6 electricity, 5d6 fire, and 5d6毒素伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:48|basic:true|traits:fire,acid,cold,electricity,poison]豁免). It can't use Dragonstorm Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Focused Breath Weapon.name: Focused Breath Weapon
Focused Breath Weapon.description: The manifestation breathes a blast of energy that deals [[/r {12d12}]]{12d12伤害} in a @Template[type:line|distance:90] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:44|basic:true]豁免). The type of damage this Breath Weapon deals can be acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison, as chosen by the manifestation when it attacks. The manifestation can't use its focused Breath Weapon again for 2 rounds, and the next time it uses its Breath Weapon, it must deal a different type of damage than the previous usage。

Contingency.name: Contingency
Contingency.description:
触发 Mengkare fails a saving throw against a spell。

效果 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (7th level) attempts to counteract the triggering spell。

Extra Reaction.name: Extra Reaction
Extra Reaction.description: Mengkare gains 2 reactions at the start of his turn each round。

Golden Luck.name: Golden Luck
Golden Luck.description:
触发 Mengkare fails a saving throw。

效果 Mengkare improves his result by one degree of success, turning a failure into a success or a critical failure into a normal failure。

Mengkare can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
Mengkare breathes in one of two ways. He can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

  • Flame (arcane,evocation,fire); Mengkare breathes a blast of flame in a @Template[type:cone|distance:80] that deals [[/r {24d6}[fire]]]{24d6火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:46|basic:true|name:Breath Weapon (Flame)]豁免).
  • Weakening Gas (arcane,necromancy); The dragon breathes a blast of weakening gas. Each creature within a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:46|name:Breath Weapon (Weakening Gas)] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 4} for 1 minute (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 5} on a critical failure).

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
Mengkare assumes a Medium humanoid form, posing as the human wizard Lamond Breachton。

The dragon takes on the appearance of any Small or Medium humanoid. This doesn't change its Speed or attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but might change the damage type its Strikes deal (typically to bludgeoning)。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: Mengkare makes two claw Strikes and one horns Strike in any order

Draconic Momentum.name: Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: When Mengkare scores a critical hit with a strike, he recharges his Breath Weapon。

Explosive Breath.name: Explosive Breath
Explosive Breath.description: When Mengkare uses Breath Weapon, he can expel an explosive orb of flame instead of a cone. When he does, he fires the orb at the corner of a square within 60 feet. The orb immediately detonates and deals [[/r {24d6}[fire]]]{24d6火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:48|basic:true|name:Explosive Orb|traits:fire]豁免) to all creatures within a @Template[type:burst|distance:30]. Creatures that critically fail their save catch on fire and take [[/r {4d6}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}。

Mental Scream Trap.name: Mental Scream Trap
Mental Scream Trap.disable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:41|name:Suppress the Magic|traits:magical,trap] to suppress the magic or @Check[type:thievery|dc:41|name:Scratch Out the Ward|traits:magical,trap] to scratch out the ward
Mental Scream Trap.hazarddescription: A psychic scream disorients creatures in the area。

Psychic Screech.name: Psychic Screech
Psychic Screech.description:
触发 A creature enters the marked area

效果 A psychic wail affects all creatures within 10 feet of the marked area, requiring them to attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:41]豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}。

失败 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 round, then stunned 2 when the paralysis ends。

大失败 The target is paralyzed for 4 rounds. At the end of each of its turns, it can attempt a new Will save to reduce the remaining duration by 1 round, or end it entirely on a critical success。

Mud Spider.name: 泥地巨蛛 Mud Spider
Mud Spider.publicNotes: 狼蛛是伏击型掠食者，但是会在洞穴外的开阔地攻击猎物。

Mudwalking.name: 泥地行者 Mudwalking
Mudwalking.description: 泥地巨蛛忽略由泥地造成的困难地形。

Giant Tarantula Venom.name: 巨狼蛛毒 Giant Tarantula Venom
Giant Tarantula Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]

最大持续时间 8轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}, 和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素}, 措手不及, 和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段4 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素} 和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1轮)

Hair Barrage.name: 刚毛射击 Hair Barrage
Hair Barrage.description: 巨狼蛛甩动它的腿，向@Template[type:cone|distance:15]范围内射出腿上的尖毛，造成[[/r {4d6}[piercing]]]{4d6穿刺伤害}，@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true]豁免。

Arborean Arm.name: 树精之臂 Arborean Arm
Arborean Arm.description: 这条魔法手臂在各种方面都具有凯缇娅原来的手臂的功能。这条手臂能变出藤蔓鞭子抽打敌人。并且，凯缇娅在攀爬时能借助手臂，拥有20尺攀爬速度，并且此时她的运动技能视为拥有大师熟练度。最后，这条手臂的原能魔法能让她使用翠绿法杖中的所有法术，如同这些法术都在她的法术表里。

Woodland Elf.name: 森林精灵 Woodland Elf
Woodland Elf.description: 凯缇娅通过一次成功的攀爬检定能以半速移动，大成功则可以全速移动。她在森林地形中总是可以通过@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{寻找掩蔽 Take Cover}动作来获得掩蔽，即便她附近没有墙壁或障碍。

Woodland Stride.name: 穿林步 Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.description: 凯缇娅无视植物造成的困难地形。

Attack of Opportunity.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
A Promise Guard can use Attack of Opportunity when a creature within her reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to its normal trigger. They can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and they disrupt actions on any hit, not just a critical hit。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Promise Guard Stance.name: Promise Guard Stance
Promise Guard Stance.description: A promise guard always has her shield raised as if they had used the Raise a Shield action, as long as they meet that action's requirements。

Shield Warden.name: Shield Warden
Shield Warden.description: A Promise guard can use their Shield Block reaction to prevent damage to an adjacent ally。

Shield Shove.name: Shield Shove
Shield Shove.description: The Promise guard makes a Strike with their longsword, then attempts to push the target back. If the Strike hits, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} until the start of the guard's next turn, and the guard can automatically Shove the target, with the same benefits as the Shove action (including the critical success effect if the Strike was a critical hit). If the guard moves to follow the target, this movement doesn't trigger reactions. In addition, if the target has to stop moving because it would hit an object, it takes damage equal to the guard's Strength modifier。

Sudden Charge.name: Sudden Charge
Sudden Charge.description: The Promise guard Strides up to double their Speed. If the guard ends their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy。

Tail Swipe.name: 尾扫 Tail Swipe
Tail Swipe.description:
触发 有生物在拉查拉克的尾扫触及范围内使用移动动作或者在一次移动动作的过程中离开自己正在占据的方格。

效果 拉查拉克对该生物作出一次尾扫打击，但此次打击要承受-2减值。若命中，她会打断该生物的动作。

Breath Weapon.name: 喷吐武器 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
拉查拉克（Racharak）喷吐火焰，对@Template[type:cone|distance:30]区域内的所有生物造成[[/r {9d6}[fire]]]{9d6火焰伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true]豁免）。

她在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用喷吐武器。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 拉查拉克以任意顺序作出两次爪抓打击和一次啃咬打击。

Shrieking Frenzy.name: 尖叫狂怒 Shrieking Frenzy
Shrieking Frenzy.description:
触发 拉查拉克的回合开始。

频率 每小时一次

效果 拉查拉克获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态，直到它的下一回合结束，并且她可以用此额外动作打击或行走。在狂怒生效期间，由于拉查拉克不断大声嚎叫，因此无法说话，隐秘检定也会自动失败。

Thrown Weapon Mastery.name: 投掷武器精通 Thrown Weapon Mastery
Thrown Weapon Mastery.description: 拉查拉克的投掷武器获得“致命D6”特征。此外，如果拉查拉克投掷一件临时武器，既不会因此受到-2减值，也不会因为投掷一件具有非致命特征的临时武器来造成致命伤害而受到减值。

Anadi Venom.name: 半蛛人毒液 Anadi Venom
Anadi Venom.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}，措手不及和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1} (1轮)

Change Shape.name: 变身 Change Shape
Change Shape.description:
半蛛人将自己变形为真实形态、蜘蛛形态、或人类形态。上面的数据是真实形态下的数据。当他们在人类形态下时，他们失去尖牙打击能力和攀爬速度。在蜘蛛形态下时，他们不能使用武器。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Spin Silk.name: 吐丝 Spin Silk
Spin Silk.description: 通过花费几分钟时间，半蛛人能通过吐丝来制造纺织品。一个半蛛人在一天内能吐出的丝足够制造一件衣服。

Attack of Opportunity.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
Attack of Opportunity.description:
Rinnarv can use Attack of Opportunity when a creature within his reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to its normal trigger. He can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and he disrupts actions on any hit, not just a critical hit。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Blood Magic.name: Blood Magic
Blood Magic.description: When Rinnarv casts one of his bloodline spells or a spell from his list of granted spells, he creates an aura that protects himself or one of the targets of the spell. The aura grants a +1 status bonus to saving throws for 1 round。

Spell Strike.name: Spell Strike
Spell Strike.description:
频率 每轮一次

触发 Rinnarv begins to Cast a Spell that targets at least 1 creature

效果 Rinnarv channels his spell through his blade. He makes a Strike with his blade against a target within reach. If the Strike is successful, the target is automatically subject to the spell. If the spell required an attack roll, the target is hit. If the spell required a saving throw, the target takes a -4 status penalty to its saving throw instead. If the spell could target multiple creatures, it targets only the creature Rinnarv hit with his Strike。

Saggorak Poltergeist.name: 萨戈拉克骚灵 Saggorak Poltergeist

Site Bound.name: 束缚之地 Site Bound
Site Bound.description: 萨戈拉克骚灵无法移动至距离区域F2达到120尺以外的位置。

Natural Invisibility.name: 天生隐形 Natural Invisibility
Natural Invisibility.description: 骚灵天生便是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}的。只有当它使用惊骇现身时才会变得可见。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: 当骚灵被摧毁时，它会在[[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4天}后于被摧毁的地点被重塑，生命值完全恢复。若哈拉尔王不再作为萨戈拉克的不死统治者存在，这些萨戈拉克骚灵便会不再复生。

Telekinetic Defense.name: 念动防御 Telekinetic Defense
Telekinetic Defense.description:
触发 有生物进入到距离骚灵10尺范围内。

效果 骚灵对触发生物进行一次念动物体打击。

Frighten.name: 惊骇现身 Frighten
Frighten.description:
需求 骚灵必须处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}。

效果 骚灵变得可见，以类人生物的骸骨面容和幽灵姿态显现。每个30尺范围内的生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:33]豁免，失败则会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}。若为大失败的话，只要惊惧状态还存在就会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}。成功时，生物会临时免疫该能力，持续1分钟。

在骚灵的下个回合开始时，他会重新变得隐身。

Telekinetic Storm.name: 念动风暴 Telekinetic Storm
Telekinetic Storm.description:
骚灵用念力投掷大量尖锐且带有锯齿的碎石，它可以选择分散攻击复数敌人，或者集中攻击一个目标。

  • 当该效果分散攻击多个敌人时，骚灵以-2的减值作出一次念动物体打击对抗30尺内的每个生物。在计算骚灵的多次攻击减值时，这些攻击被视为一次攻击，而且直至上述所有攻击结束之前，多次攻击减值都不会增加。
  • 当该效果只有一个目标时，骚灵对该目标作出一次念动物体打击，伤害增加至6d12点。失败时造成[[/r 2d12 #Telekinetic Storm Failure]]{2d12伤害}，大失败时不造成伤害。

Efficient Capture.name: Efficient Capture
Efficient Capture.description:
需求 The Scarlet Triad agent has manacles in hand and is adjacent to a creature。

效果 The Scarlet Triad agent attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. If they succeed at an attack roll with a [[/r 1d20+24]]{+24 modifier} against the target's AC, they apply the manacles。

Precise Debilitations.name: Precise Debilitations
Precise Debilitations.description:
触发 The Scarlet Triad agent's Strike hits a flat-footed creature and deals damage。

效果 The Scarlet Triad agent applies one of the following debilitations to the creature, which lasts until the end of their next turn。

  • Brow Gash The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}.
  • Deep Cut The target takes an additional [[/r 2d6[precision]]]{2d6精准伤害} from the Scarlet Triad agent's attacks.
  • Hamstring The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
  • Low Blow The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.otUESSH8BDdPKHtb]{效果: Hamstring}

Weapon Trick.name: Weapon Trick
Weapon Trick.description: When the Scarlet Triad agent critically succeeds at an attack roll against a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} creature, they apply the critical specialization effect for the weapon they are wielding。

Return Fire.name: Return Fire
Return Fire.description:
触发 The Scarlet Triad boss is the target of a physical ranged attack

效果 They gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses and the boss has their shortbow in hand, the boss Strikes the attacker with their shortbow。

Darting Shot.name: Darting Shot
Darting Shot.description: The Scarlet Triad boss Feints a target, Strides up to their Speed, and makes a Strike with their shortbow in any order. They can Feint any target within 30 feet when using this ability。

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
[[/r {4d6}[precision]]]{4d6 additional精准伤害}

When the monster Strikes a creature that has the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, it also deals the listed precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon must also be an agile or finesse weapon。

Stunning Retort.name: Stunning Retort
Stunning Retort.description:
触发 An enemy critically fails a Strike against the enforcer

效果 The enforcer Strikes with their sap against that enemy if they're within reach; otherwise, the enforcer attempts an Intimidation check to Demoralize that enemy。

Dual Abuse.name: Dual Abuse
Dual Abuse.description:
The enforcer uses the pain of one attack as an opening to deal a devastating second blow. The enforcer makes two attacks against the same target: a scimitar Strike and sap Strike (in any order) or two composite shortbow Strikes. If both attacks hit, the second attack deals an additional [[/r {3d6}]]{3d6伤害}, and the enforcer gives the target one of the following conditions until the end of the enforcer's next turn: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

This counts as two attacks when calculating the enforcer's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks。

Efficient Capture.name: Efficient Capture
Efficient Capture.description:
需求 The enforcer has manacles in hand and is adjacent to a creature

效果 The enforcer attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. If the enforcer succeeds at an attack roll with a [[/r 1d20+30 #Manacles]]{+30 modifier} against the target's AC, they apply the manacles。

Seismic Spears Trap.name: Seismic Spears Trap
Seismic Spears Trap.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:43|name:Disable the Wards|traits:magical,trap](大师)to disable the wards or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 38) to counteract the ward。
Seismic Spears Trap.hazarddescription: Lines of searing lava lance through the area, causing targets to shake as if caught in an earthquake and potentially become petrified。

Cataclysmic Rain.name: Cataclysmic Rain
Cataclysmic Rain.description:
触发 A creature enters the marked area

效果 Fiery spears make one Strike against each living creature within 5 feet of the marked area。

Personal Quake.name: Personal Quake
Personal Quake.description: A creature struck by a seismic spear is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 3} for 1 round as their body shakes uncontrollably. On a critical hit, a target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:39] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified} for 1 minute, or permanently on a critical failure。

strike-Seismic Spear.name: Seismic Spear
strike-Seismic Spear.description: No MAP applies to strikes made by seismic spear attacks

No MAP.name: No MAP
No MAP.description: The Seismic Spear Strikes do not apply a MAP。

Skeletal Hellknight.name: 地狱骑士骷髅 Skeletal Hellknight

Command Skeletons.name: 指挥骷髅 Command Skeletons
Command Skeletons.description: 地狱骑士骷髅能够指挥附近骷髅守卫的动作，命令它们执行诸如夹击敌人和集中攻击特定目标之类的战术。只要地狱骑士骷髅行动并指挥其他骷髅，这些骷髅就会获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.hFtNbo1LKYCoDy2O]{借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity}反应动作。

Invoke Reckoning.name: 责罚恳求 Invoke Reckoning
Invoke Reckoning.description:
触发 地狱骑士骷髅用打击命中一名敌人；

效果 地狱骑士骷髅让目标承受尖钉骑士团之责罚所带来的痛苦——这本是骑士团用于强化意志的苦修仪式。目标生物会感觉好像有钉子刺入身体一般，它必须成功通过@Check[type:will|dc:17|traits:damaging-effect]豁免，失败则会由于痛苦而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。豁免大失败时，这股疼痛会化为真正的创口，对受害者造成额外[[/r {2d6}[piercing]]]{2d6穿刺伤害}。

Soulbound Ruin.name: 缚魂废墟 Soulbound Ruin
Soulbound Ruin.publicNotes: 那些踏足废墟的人提到，有时他们感觉一种超自然的存在就在身边，仿佛死者的魂魄正在目不转睛地注视着他们。这类存在可能并非虚妄，那些不能放弃与物质位面的联系的人常以幽灵或其他不死阴影的形式出现。但有时，死者的灵魂并没有显现为独立的个体，而是融入了它们周遭的石头和砂浆。当足够多的灵魂依附在一个地方——不管是一个家，一个地底墓穴，还是一个城堡——它就会获得自己的“生命”，变成一个缚魂废墟。

Impede.name: 阻碍 Impede
Impede.description:
频率 每轮一次

触发 在缚魂废墟中的一个生物使用了带有移动特征的动作。

效果 缚魂废墟做出剧烈反应以阻止生物的移动，通过发射尖刺、投掷砖块或以其他方式阻碍目标。目标必须成功通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:35]豁免否则陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}状态。

Vulnerability to Exorcism.name: 驱散易伤 Vulnerability to Exorcism
Vulnerability to Exorcism.description: 当一个缚魂废墟在对抗一个会驱散痛苦的灵魂，或操弄这些灵魂的法术——例如@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{放逐术 Banishment}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{缚魂术 Bind Soul}——的豁免骰中失败时，它不会受到法术原有的效果，而是受到每法术环级[[/r 10]]{10伤害}。

Collapse Ceiling.name: 穹顶坍塌 Collapse Ceiling
Collapse Ceiling.description:
废墟坍塌至多三个10×10尺大小的属于它的天花板。每坍塌一个部分废墟会受到[[/r {10}]]{10伤害}，并且在修复之前不能坍塌相同的部分。

这些区域中的每个生物受到[[/r 8d10[bludgeoning]]]{8d10钝击伤害}，@Check[type:reflex|dc:35|basic:true]豁免。豁免失败的生物还会被@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}在瓦砾下直到他成功使用逃脱动作（DC 33）。

Pervasive Attacks.name: 广域打击 Pervasive Attacks
Pervasive Attacks.description: 缚魂废墟的宏伟建筑打击能以任何位于废墟内的生物为目标。

Self-Repair.name: 自我修复 Self-Repair
Self-Repair.description:
废墟可以花10分钟修复自己，以恢复[[/r {30}[healing]]]{30生命值}。如果在这段时间内缚魂废墟被打搅，它会失去专注，而修复工作也就失败了。

即使废墟的生命值降低到0，这个技能也能起作用，只有进行一个@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dbd5W6G8U2vzWolN]{祝圣术 Consecrate}仪式来净化建筑，缚魂废墟才会被摧毁。这个仪式必须奉献给一位善神或者一位强烈抵制不死生物的神，比如法莱斯玛。

Spiked Doorframe.name: 尖刺门框 Spiked Doorframe
Spiked Doorframe.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Deactivate Trigger|traits:hazard,mechanical,trap,action:disable-a-device](受训)可以解除门把手上的触发器。
Spiked Doorframe.hazarddescription: 从门框中突刺的尖刺会贯穿任何试图开门的人。

Spikes.name: 钉刺 Spikes
Spikes.description:
触发 门被开启。

效果 陷阱作出一次攻击对抗开门的生物。

Spiritbound Aluum.name: Spiritbound Aluum
Spiritbound Aluum.publicNotes:
Whereas most aluums are animated by the souls of volunteers loyal to Katapesh, the Pactmasters created a handful of more capable (and deadly) aluums powered by the souls of a dozen or more dangerous criminals. These spiritbound aluums are rarely used as peacekeepers, instead serving as assassins, elite bodyguards, or riot control during times of martial law。

A spiritbound aluum has a dull blue crystalline focus that stores constituent souls, surrounded by a host of smaller gems used for trapping souls the Pactmasters wish to deny from entering the Great Beyond. Spiritbound aluums rarely use this soul-binding ability except when instructed by their masters. However, the murderous or embittered souls within the aluum sometimes exert control and willfully consume a departing soul either out of malice or to incorporate it into the construct's core. If not relieved of its trapped souls in a timely manner, a spiritbound aluum can develop enough will to overcome its masters' orders and even awaken to full sentience. These rogue aluums typically lose the mindless trait, are evil, have an Intelligence modifier of -2 or higher, and gain several skills with bonuses ranging from +25 to +32。

Aluums are powerful metal and stone constructs originally created by the Pactmasters to maintain order in Katapesh. The construction of each aluum includes the creation of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.bU731I8njNmSAQhQ]{Aluum Charm}, a brass pendant set with a blue crystal designed to control that particular construct. The charm constructed at the same time as an aluum is called its linked charm。

Aluum Antimagic.name: Aluum Antimagic
Aluum Antimagic.description: Spiritbound aluums are immune to spells and magical abilities, with two exceptions. A negative spell or magical ability grants a spiritbound aluum the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened} condition until the end of its next turn instead of its normal effects. A positive spell or ability makes a spiritbound aluum @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn instead of its normal effects。

Obliteration Beam.name: Obliteration Beam
Obliteration Beam.description:
需求 The spiritbound aluum has bound a soul using its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul} innate spell

效果 The spiritbound aluum transforms the captured soul's essence into raw magical energy, channeling the spirit into a beam that deals [[/r {20d6}[force]]]{20d6 force伤害} in a @Template[type:line|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:38|basic:true]豁免). The remaining fragments of the captured soul are released to the Great Beyond。

The spiritbound aluum can't use Obliteration Beam again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Paralyzing Force.name: Paralyzing Force
Paralyzing Force.description: A creature damaged by the Spirtibound Aluum's fist Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for [[/r 1d4 #minutes]]{1d4 minutes} and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Soul Binder.name: Soul Binder
Soul Binder.description:
When a spiritbound aluum uses its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul} innate spell, it binds the soul into its central crystal instead of the normal material component. The crystal can hold up to 60 souls。

When encountered, a spiritbound aluum's crystal typically contains [[/br 1d6 #souls]]{1d6 souls}。

Soul Shriek.name: Soul Shriek
Soul Shriek.description:
The aluum enforcer emits a keening wail in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals [[/r {16d6}[sonic]]]{16d6 sonic伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|basic:true]豁免). A creature that fails its save is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3} on a critical failure。

The aluum can't use Soul Shriek again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Site Bound (Jewelgate Way Station).name: 束缚之地 Site Bound (宝石中转站)
Site Bound (Jewelgate Way Station).description:
宝石中转站

典型的灵魂通常只能距离在他被杀死或作祟的地点很近的区域逗留。这个限制一般为120尺远。部分幽灵会被限制在对他来说具有特殊意义的房间、建筑、物品或生物上，而非具体的某个地点。

Rejuvenation.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description:
塔兰米拉的幽灵被哭嚎水晶束缚在中转站；若该危害被解除或被摧毁，塔兰米拉会由于记忆的恢复而长舒一口气——这股精神能量的迸发会影响区域内的所有PC，让他们获得选取古代魔法的资格，正如塔兰米拉生前曾经研习的领域一般，即水晶守护者变体。片刻之后，塔兰米拉逐渐消失了，她的灵魂已经步入来世。

当幽灵被摧毁时，他会在[[/br 2d4 #days]]{2d4天}后在被束缚的地点重新生成，生命值全满。只有在有人确定了幽灵存在的成因并纠正任何阻止幽灵安息的因素时，幽灵才能被永久摧毁。

Resonant Wail.name: 共振恸哭 Resonant Wail
Resonant Wail.description:
塔兰米拉发出充满痛苦的绝望哭嚎。所有30尺范围内的生物必须尝试@Check[type:will|dc:33]豁免进行对抗。

塔兰米拉在[[/br 1d4 #Resonant Wail Recharge]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用共振恸哭。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 该生物在3轮内痛苦嚎叫。这些尖叫声会与房间内的哭嚎水晶产生共振，使得水晶在此期间于对抗该生物的攻击检定上获得+2状态加值。

失败 同成功，不过该生物会在1分钟内由于无法自控的抽泣而陷入缓慢1。若该生物已经由于极度绝望而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，那么只要该生物同时处于这两个效果影响，就会陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2}。

大失败 同失败，不过该生物还会由于被悲痛压垮而陷入@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}。

Telekinetic Crystalline Assault.name: 感灵水晶侵袭 Telekinetic Crystalline Assault
Telekinetic Crystalline Assault.description: 塔兰米拉让空中充满旋转的水晶，对@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]区域内的所有生物造成[[/r {7d6}[slashing]]]{7d6挥砍伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:33|basic:true]豁免）。

Tarrasque, The Armageddon Engine.name: Tarrasque, The Armageddon Engine
Tarrasque, The Armageddon Engine.publicNotes:
The most powerful spawn is Tarrasque, whose legend spread across countless worlds beyond Golarion. Its destruction of the nation of Ninshabur and its march across Avistan in -632 AR culminated in the destruction of the flying Shory city of Kho before this spawn was sealed away in a remote cavern。

The spawn are titanic terrors of immense size and strength that live only to destroy. Tarrasque and Xotani are but two of Rovagug's spawn. Others, including Chemnosit (the Monarch Worm), Kothogaz (the Dance of Disharmony), and Volnagur (the End-Singer) hold places of horror in the history of various regions, but the most famed is Ulunat (the Unholy First), whose beetle-like carcass remains sprawled in Sothis, the capital of Osirion。

Carapace.name: Carapace
Carapace.description: Tarrasque is immune to cones, lines, rays, and magic missile spells. These effects bounce harmlessly off its scales。

Inexorable.name: Inexorable
Inexorable.description: Tarrasque recovers from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned} conditions at the end of its turn. It's also immune to penalties to its Speeds, and it ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain。

Reactive.name: Reactive
Reactive.description: Tarrasque gains 3 reactions each round. It can still use only one reaction per trigger。

Reflect.name: Reflect
Reflect.description:
触发 Tarrasque's carapace deflects an effect。

效果 The effect is redirected back at its source。

Destructive Frenzy.name: Destructive Frenzy
Destructive Frenzy.description: Tarrasque makes a jaws Strike, two claw Strikes, two horn Strikes, and one tail Strike in any order。

Fast Swallow.name: Fast Swallow
Fast Swallow.description:
触发 Tarrasque Grabs a creature with its jaws

效果 Tarrasque uses Swallow Whole。

Spine Volley.name: Spine Volley
Spine Volley.description:
Tarrasque flings spines in a @Template[type:cone|distance:120], dealing [[/r {3d10+20}[piercing]]]{3d10+20穿刺伤害} to each creature in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:53|basic:true]豁免)。

Tarrasque can't use Spine Volley again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Trample.name: 践踏 Trample
Trample.description:
Huge or smaller, claw, @Check[type:reflex|dc:49|basic:true] save. When Tarrasque Tramples, it can Stride up to triple its Speed。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Trample]

Teyam Ishtori.name: Teyam Ishtori
Teyam Ishtori.publicNotes:
Demiliches are formed when a lich, through carelessness or by accident, loses its phylactery. As years pass, the lich's body crumbles to dust, leaving only the skull as the seat of its necromantic power. The lich enters a sort of torpor, its mind left wandering the planes in search of ever greater mysteries. The lich gradually loses the ability to cast spells and its magic items slowly subsume into its new form. Negative energy concentrates around the skull, causing some of its bones and teeth to petrify with power and turn into blight crystals. The resulting lich skull, embedded with arcane gemstones and suffused with palpably powerful magic, forms a creature called a demilich。

Despite its near-constant state of inactivity, a demilich grows restless from time to time, especially when living creatures draw near. Only then does the demilich's hunger for life stir once more, causing it to lash out with terrifying bursts of power in attempts to consume vital energy. Unlike an ordinary lich, should the demilich's skull be destroyed, its bond to the world is permanently severed, although some theorize that even then it is not truly slain. Rather, some think that once the demilich is destroyed, its foul and tormented mind is finally free to wander the planes and find new ways to enact its will. For the short-lived common folk of the Material Plane, this is good enough, though eons later a demilich may reappear in the region it once inhabited with a new—and even more insidious—agenda。

To gain more time to complete their goals, some desperate spellcasters pursue immortality by embracing undeath. After long years of research and the creation of a special container called a phylactery, a spellcaster takes the final step by imbibing a deadly concoction or casting dreadful incantations that transform them into a lich. While most undertake this drastic plan to continue their work or fulfill some long-term plan, others become liches because they fear death or to fulfill some malevolent purpose, such as long-sworn revenge. Regardless, the result is permanent and carries with it the potential to alter history—both that of those who transform themselves and of the countless mortals that will inevitably suffer as a result of a lich's new power。

After its metamorphosis, a lich often finds some quiet place to dwell, typically protected by a variety of guardians and traps, for two primary purposes. First, a lich requires solitude in order to plan its elaborate schemes, and second, few mortals (if any) deign to interact with these legendarily corrupt necromancers. One reason begets the other, as the self-imposed isolation of a lich often drives the lich insane, further solidifying its separation from civilization. The longer a lich lives, the more meticulous a planner it becomes, secreting itself within a labyrinth of deadly puzzles, misdirection, and monsters. A lich's servants and guardians are absolutely loyal, either due to their nature (such as constructs or other undead) or as a result of compulsion using powerful magic. Many liches go mad, in time, and the nature of a lich's lair is a good indicator of the undead's current mental state。

For all the protections it arrays around itself, a lich will go to greater lengths to guard its phylactery, as it knows that the destruction of this magical container spells doom for the lich. A lich is notoriously difficult to bargain with, though the threat of damaging its phylactery is a sure way to gain the upper hand in such a negotiation。

Torpor.name: Torpor
Torpor.description: Typically, a demilich is inert when encountered and doesn't take actions until its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WG91Z5TiR6oO5FOw]{Contingency} reaction has been triggered。

Contingency.name: Contingency
Contingency.description:
Teyam has one permanent 8th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WG91Z5TiR6oO5FOw]{Contingency} spell in effect with one of its arcane innate spells of 5th level or lower as the companion spell- typically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door}。

触发 While Teyam is in torpor, a creature disturbs Teyam's remains, touches her treasure, or casts a spell that would affect Teyam。

效果 Teyam ends torpor, rolls initiative, and gains the effect of her contingency's companion spell. The contingency resets after 24 hours。

Countermeasures.name: Countermeasures
Countermeasures.description:
触发 Teyam查咯猿人的回合开始。

效果 Teyam casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zR67Rt3UMHKC5evy]{Blink}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OOELvfkTedBMlWtq]{Spell Turning}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} on itself. It usually chooses spell turning unless it already has that spell in effect。

Telekinetic Whirlwind.name: Telekinetic Whirlwind
Telekinetic Whirlwind.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20尺} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Telekinetic whirlwind activates when Teyam ends torpor. Loose debris in the area whip up into a whirling storm. This obscures vision, making any creature in the area concealed, and causes creatures in its area (except Teyam) to treat all creatures as concealed. Any creature other than Teyam that enters or begins its turn in the aura takes [[/r {2d12}[bludgeoning]]]{2d12钝击伤害}。

Demilich Eye Gems.name: Demilich Eye Gems
Demilich Eye Gems.description:
A demilich has gemstone eyes that glow when the demilich is active. Each eye contains an 8th-level spell that targets one creature (usually one eye has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Oj1PJBMQD9vuwCv7]{Maze} and the other @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BKIet436snMNcnez]{Polar Ray}). The demilich can Activate an eye. This uses the number of spellcasting actions the spell requires, and also requires command and envision components。

When the demilich casts a spell from a gemstone eye, that eye stops glowing for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}, during which time that eye's spell can't be used. Occasionally, one or both of the two @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Q4o8pEdxSY0bnJQZ]{Demilich Eye Gems} can be harvested from a destroyed demilich as magic items。

Devour Soul.name: Devour Soul
Devour Soul.description:
需求 A soul has been trapped in one of Teyam's blight quartz gems for 24 hours。

效果 Teyam consumes the soul. The soul is utterly destroyed, and Teyam regains HP equal to double the creature's level。

Mental Magic.name: Mental Magic
Mental Magic.description: Teyam can replace all material and somatic components for casting spells with verbal components, and can replace all Interact components for activating magic items with envision components。

Staff Gems.name: Staff Gems
Staff Gems.description: Teyam long ago absorbed the spells from a staff into gemstone nodules embedded in her skull, with larger nodules representing higher-level spells. She can cast any of the spells as though it were Activating the staff, and regains 1 charge per 4 hours spent in torpor, to a maximum of 10 charges. Teyam has the spells from a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.6m9niDjhA6tBfp5x]{Staff of Power}

Trap Soul.name: Trap Soul
Trap Soul.description:
频率 once per day per gem

效果 Ten blight quartz gemstones on Teyam's skull can trap the souls of the living. The Activated gem casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul}. This bind soul can target and affect a dying creature instead of a corpse. The dying creature can attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:43] save; if it succeeds, it doesn't die and its soul is not trapped but it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (or is unaffected entirely on a critical success). When the soul of a creature gets trapped, the creature's body swiftly turns to dust。

The gemstones work like the black sapphires used in bind soul, except that they can hold creatures of up to 17th level and have a value of 200 gp apiece. Teyam can Devour a Soul it has trapped。

Tixitog.name: 猎蛛怪 Tixitog
Tixitog.publicNotes:
猎蛛怪是一种畸变的异怪，它们以巨蜘蛛的洞穴为家。猎蛛怪对毒素免疫，身上复盖着厚厚的粘液，能安全通过黏糊糊的蜘蛛网。猎蛛怪通常会偷蜘蛛储存在巢穴里的食物，也会捕猎蜘蛛，但是他们会小心控制蛛群数量，不会杀死太多蜘蛛以免食物耗尽。然而他们最喜欢的食物是偶然闯入巢穴的冒险者和探险者。

这些奇怪的生物有长方形的身体，表面复盖着一层粘稠透明的粘液，长着三只黑色的大眼睛、八条粗壮的节肢，其中四个是倒着长的，指向上方，让怪物很容易地在狭窄的洞穴的天花板或地板上爬行，并挤过狭窄的空间。当它们下颚紧闭的时候，口器看起来又小又细，但张开的时候就会向两边张开成可怕的角度，露出几十颗尖牙和一条奇怪的长舌头。

猎蛛怪通常会在蜘蛛巢穴里躲着不让蜘蛛发现自己，不是因为害怕，而是怕把蜘蛛吓走之后只留下一个空巢。当猎蛛怪从阴影中出现时，大多数蜘蛛会逃离而非攻击它，因此它会利用这种行为将蜘蛛群逼迫到它喜欢的地方。这对于那些身处猎蛛怪巢穴的探险者来说是相当不妙的，因为当一大群蜘蛛从巢穴里冲向他们时，探险者们往往不会意识到有更大的危险紧随其后。

Web Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.name: 蛛网感 (模糊感官) 60尺
Web Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet.description: 猎蛛怪能通过自己触碰的蛛网来感受到同样触碰到这张网的生物所产生的震动。

Tongue Pull.name: 舌拉 Tongue Pull
Tongue Pull.description: 当猎蛛怪以舌头打击命中小型或更小的生物时，目标被拽进猎蛛怪的嘴。然后猎蛛怪能尝试对目标进行活吞动作。

Town Hall Fire.name: 镇公所火灾 Town Hall Fire
Town Hall Fire.disable:
消除危害需要熄灭火焰。若水量较少，如@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.WzLKjSw6hsBhuklC]{造水术 Create Water}或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.jfVCuOpzC6mUrf6f]{水流冲击 Hydraulic Push}的水量，则通常可以浇灭5 尺方格的空间。大量的水，如一桶装满的水，通常可以浇灭@Template[type:line|distance:10|width:10]{10*10尺区域}（或4个方格构成的其他形状）。将一桶水泼向火焰需要一个交互动作。一个水袋内的水甚至无法浇灭一个5尺方格的火焰。寒冷效果也可以熄灭火焰，但仅限于此效果能影响一片区域的情况时；在灭火时，寒冷通常没有水有效，因此@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.EpxmUtLpCkE8R6KJ]{霜冻瓶 Frost Vial}能熄灭5尺方格的火焰，而@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{冰冻射线 Ray of Frost}无法灭火。

位于镇公所外的纪念圆台有数个可以使用的水泵，但议事厅与水泵间的距离使得让PC来回取水灭火的做法变得不切实际。然而，PC可以指示其他意志坚定且鼓起勇气的观众组成一条传递水桶的长队。这需要15名观众（由议员或PC 们救援的观众也包含在内）排成队列，从镇民开始列队到开始从纪念圆台的水泵取水需要两轮时间。自第3轮起，便有一个装满的水桶在议事厅南部入口处，可供每名PC回合开始时取用。传桶队伍的成员在议事厅外排成一队，不会因为吸入烟尘而受到伤害。

若有PC想要自行取水，那么从议事厅南门到水泵的距离为150尺，因此抵达水泵或者返回议事厅通常会需要6个动作。装满水桶需要一个交互动作。

根据你的判断，其他方法也可以用于控制火势。举例说明：PC们可以找到一些东西来通过控制火焰的路径来隔绝火焰，或者使用披风扑灭部分火焰。
Town Hall Fire.hazarddescription: 火焰吞噬了西门以及与其相邻的东侧@Template[type:line|distance:10|width:10]{10*10尺区域}，之后的每个回合它都会向周边蔓延。
Town Hall Fire.routine:
轮到火灾的回合时，火势会向外蔓延，蔓延的方格数量等同于当前已经占据方格数量的一半，最低为1格。由你来判断火势蔓延的方向——通常来说是那些含有易燃材料的区域。任何生物若在其回合结束时与火焰相邻的话，则会承受[[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6火焰伤害}，位于火焰之内的则要承受[[/r {4d6}[fire]]]{4d6火焰伤害}。上述伤害均需要作出@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true|traits:complex,environmental,fire,hazard]豁免。每名生物每轮仅会因火灾而承受一次伤害。（为方便起见，仅在NPC及其盟友身上追踪受伤情况，而不用记录观众的情况；第5回合和第7回合的段落内有关于观众健康情况的说明）。

火灾自第1回合起，之后每次轮到火灾的回合都会产生额外效果。

第2回合 议事厅的北门突然打开，火焰冲了进来，引燃了门前@Template[type:line|distance:10|width:10]{10*10尺区域}。所有火焰都会在后续的回合内按照上文所述的速率蔓延。在判断蔓延速率时，不同的火焰区域连接在一起后便会并为一片火焰。

第4回合及之后 房间内的生物在回合结束时会因为吸入烟尘而承受[[/r 1d6 #Smoke Inhalation Damage]]{1d6伤害}。任何使用一个交互动作用湿布捂住口鼻（或使用其他创造性解决方案）的生物能使吸入烟尘造成的伤害减半。

第5回合 仍然位于室内的观众会因为燃烧和浓烟而@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}。

第7回合 仍然位于室内的观众会死亡。

Perfect Will.name: Perfect Will
Perfect Will.description: If Uri rolls a success on a Will saving throw, he gets a critical success instead; if he rolls a critical failure on a Will save, he gets a failure instead。

Punish Imperfection.name: Punish Imperfection
Punish Imperfection.description:
触发 A creature within Uri's reach fails an attack roll, saving throw, or skill check

效果 Uri makes an unarmed Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack hits, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 3} until the end of its next turn (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 4} on a critical failure)。

Reactionary.name: Reactionary
Reactionary.description: Uri can use 2 reactions in a round, but he can't perform the same reaction more than once per round。

Slash and Slam.name: Slash and Slam
Slash and Slam.description: Uri makes two Strikes: one with his scimitar and one with his shield spikes. If both hit, the overwhelming power of the attack leaves the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2} if one of the Strikes was a critical hit, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3} if both Strikes were critical hits). These Strikes count as one attack for Uri's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks。

Swift Capture.name: Swift Capture
Swift Capture.description:
需求 Uri has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.5zkoqnp6X5yPCXVy]{Manacles} in his possession and is adjacent to a creature

效果 Uri sheathes a weapon he's carrying, then attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.5zkoqnp6X5yPCXVy]{Manacles}. If Uri succeeds at an attack roll with a [[/r 1d20+36 #Manacles]]{+36 modifier} against the target's AC, he applies the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.5zkoqnp6X5yPCXVy]{Manacles}。

Swift Slash.name: Swift Slash
Swift Slash.description: Uri Strides and makes a scimitar Strike at any point during the Stride。

Vazgorlu.name: Vazgorlu
Vazgorlu.publicNotes: The arthropod monstrosity known as a vazgorlu makes its home on the Astral Plane or inside of a stable portal, ambushing creatures that travel there using dimensional magic。

Hostile Juxtaposition.name: Hostile Juxtaposition
Hostile Juxtaposition.description:
触发 A creature targets the vazgorlu with a Strike

效果 The vazgorlu chooses a different creature within 60 feet and attempts to swap places with that creature using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door} in the instant before the Strike. The target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:39|traits:arcana]豁免。

大成功 The target resists the teleportation, and the vazgorlu can't use Hostile Juxtaposition for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

成功 The target resists the teleportation。

失败 The target and the vazgorlu instantly swap places, and the triggering Strike is resolved against the target instead。

大失败 As failure, but the target is transported to the vazgorlu's demiplane after resolving the triggering Strike against it。

Demiplane Lair.name: Demiplane Lair
Demiplane Lair.description: A vazgorlu maintains a 30-foot-diameter demiplane in the Astral Plane. Gravity in this demiplane pulls out from the center, so that creatures can walk upon the inner surface. A vazgorlu's demiplane lair lacks a built-in point of exit, and if the vazgorlu fails to visit the demiplane during a 24-hour period, the demiplane collapses- all objects and creatures within are then returned to their original locations in the multiverse before they entered the demiplane. A vazgorlu can create a replacement demiplane lair with 24 hours of concentration。

Dimensional Tether.name: Dimensional Tether
Dimensional Tether.description: A creature hit by a vazgorlu's web Strike is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and stuck to the nearest surface until it Escapes (DC 42). As long as it remains immobilized by the web, the web attempts to counteract any effect that would move the webbed creature to another plane, with a counteract level of 10 and using the vazgorlu's [[/r 1d20+38 #Dimensional Tether Counteract]]{Arcana} skill to attempt the counteract check。

Redirect Portal.name: Redirect Portal
Redirect Portal.description: A vazgorlu can spend 10 minutes in contact with a magical portal to redirect it, causing the portal to instead lead to its demiplane lair. To do so, the vazgorlu must succeed at a [[/r 1d20+41 #Redirect Portal]]{Portal Lore} check (the DC is either equal to the caster's spell DC for a portal created by a spell, or set by the portal's level; if the portal in question has no level listed, assume it's a 20th-level portal)。

Wing Deflection.name: 偏转之翼 Wing Deflection
Wing Deflection.description:
触发 维什米瑞克斯成为攻击的目标。

效果 维什米瑞克斯抬起一边的翅膀，在对抗触发攻击时AC获得+2环境加值。若维什米瑞克斯正在飞行，他在攻击后会下降10尺的高度。

Breath Weapon.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
维什米瑞克斯喷出一股熔岩流，对@Template[type:cone|distance:60]{60尺锥形}区域造成[[/r {9d6}[fire]+{4d12}[bludgeoning]]]{9d6火焰伤害和4d12钝击伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true]豁免）。

它在[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用吐息。

Draconic Frenzy.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
Draconic Frenzy.description: 维什米瑞克斯以任意顺序作出两次爪抓打击和一次角顶打击。

Draconic Momentum.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
Draconic Momentum.description: 每当维什米瑞克斯的打击造成重击时，吐息就会充能。

Magma Swim.name: 熔岩泳者 Magma Swim
Magma Swim.description: 维什米瑞克斯的游泳速度仅限于龙在熔岩或者融化的岩浆内游泳时生效。

Volcanic Purge.name: 火山洗礼 Volcanic Purge
Volcanic Purge.description:
若维什米瑞克斯的下个动作是使用吐息，那么他喷出的熔岩会附着在吐息伤害的目标身上。每个在对抗吐息的豁免时失败的生物会承受[[/r {4d6}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}，而且只要该持续火焰伤害还存在，他们的速度还会承受-10状态减值。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.7qoZauizAKfPIXeu]{效果: 火山洗礼}

Vision of Dahak.name: 达哈克之影 Vision of Dahak
Vision of Dahak.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:26|name:Counteract Dahak With Prayers|traits:complex,fire,magical,trap,hazard](专家)向着非邪恶神祇进行祈祷能反制达哈克的化身；若角色在宗教技能上的熟练度仅仅只是受训的话，则作出此检定的祈祷对象必须是阿普苏（Apsu），@Check[type:thievery|dc:30|name:Divert the Hazard's Energy Back|traits:complex,fire,magical,trap,hazard](专家)能将危害的能量转移回其本身，或者成功进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（4环；反制DC26）。
Vision of Dahak.hazarddescription: 通道墙壁上喷出的火焰与浓烟融合在一起，构成了熊熊燃烧着的达哈克本尊；成功通过@Check[type:religion|dc:20|name:Recognize Depiction of Dahak|traits:hazard,complex,fire,magical,trap,action:recall-knowledge]检定回忆知识能注意到，这头火焰之龙与毁灭龙神传说中的形象十分相似。
Vision of Dahak.reset: 当猎手门中转站内没有任何生物时，达哈克之影便会消失并自动重置。
Vision of Dahak.routine: (2动作) 达哈克之影出现在距离中转站正中心最近的生物旁边，之后对着尽可能覆盖更多目标的方向使用它的喷吐武器。

Manifest.name: 现身 Manifest
Manifest.description:
触发 有生物在中转站内。

效果 达哈克之影出现在与该生物相邻15尺方格内，并投掷先攻。

Breath Weapon.name: 喷吐武器 Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description: 达哈克之影从它熊熊燃烧的喉咙中爆发出一股火焰，对@Template[type:cone|distance:60]区域内的所有生物造成[[/r {6d6}[fire]]]{6d6火焰伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true|traits:magical,trap,hazard]豁免）。

Drain Bonded Item.name: 汲取连接物品 Drain Bonded Item
Drain Bonded Item.description:
当沃兹使用此能力时，她同时回复1聚能点。

频率 每天一次

你小心翼翼汲取自己连结物品的奥术能量，让你可以留存足够的能量去施放下一个比较弱的法术。如果你下一个动作是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施法 Cast the Spell}，并使用汲取连结物品的能量，你额外获得一次汲取连结物品的使用次数。你必须在下一回合结束前使用，不然就会失去，并且你只能把次使用次数用比首次使用汲取连结物品所施展法术环级低2环或更低的法术上。

Eschew Materials.name: 施法免材 Eschew Materials
Eschew Materials.description: 你用巧妙的方法复制某些材料的奥法精华。在需要材料成分的施法行动中，你可以借由在大气中绘制复杂用以取代的法印，在没有法术材料包的情况提供材料成分。不同于提供姿势成分，你必须有一只完全自由的手。但这无法取代任何在法术花费项目上列出的材料。

Reach Spell.name: 及远法术 Reach Spell
Reach Spell.description: 你能延伸自己法术的距离。如果你下个动作是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施法 Cast a Spell}，然后法术是有距离的，那法术的距离增加30尺。作为增加法术距离的标准，如果有法术的距离是接触，那你可以把它的距离变成30尺。

Wailing Crystals.name: 哭嚎水晶 Wailing Crystals
Wailing Crystals.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:29|name:Fracture the Crystals|traits:hazard,complex,environmental,magical](大师)能够谨慎地击碎晶体，或@Check[type:crafting|dc:27|name:Stop the Resonance|traits:hazard,complex,environmental,magical](专家)能够放置其他物体来使其停止共振，上述两种方式都可以解除一片5尺见方的水晶簇。
Wailing Crystals.hazarddescription: 三簇闪闪发光、色彩鲜艳的水晶遭到死灵能量的腐蚀，使得它们能够引发负面的情绪。必须将全部三簇水晶解除或摧毁才能使危害失效。
Wailing Crystals.reset: 当哭嚎水晶周围20尺范围内不再有活物时，它便会关闭并重置。
Wailing Crystals.routine: (3动作) 危害会用每个动作进行痛苦尖叫。哭嚎水晶每有一个5尺见方的水晶簇被摧毁或破损，它便会失去一个动作。
Wailing Crystals.stealthdetails: (大师)或@Check[type:perception|dc:37|name:Notice Ghostly Faces|traits:hazard,complex,environmental,magical](大师)能注意到水晶之中出现了嚎叫着的鬼脸。

Echoing Cry.name: 哭嚎回响 Echoing Cry
Echoing Cry.description:
触发 有活物出现在距离哭嚎水晶20尺范围内时。

效果 一声绝望的哭嚎在水晶中回响，对宝石门中转站（Jewelgate Way Station）内的所有活物的心智生效，用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{极度绝望 Crushing Despair}（7环，@Check[type:will|dc:33|name:Crushing Despair|traits:mental,emotion,magical,spell]）影响他们。

之后危害投掷先攻。

Anguished Shriek.name: 痛苦尖叫 Anguished Shriek
Anguished Shriek.description: 水晶之中翻卷着的死灵能量化为尖叫着的扭曲面容向着20尺范围内的一名随机活物迸射出来。目标承受[[/r {4d6}[mental] + {4d6}[sonic]]]{4d6心灵伤害和4d6音波伤害}（@Check[type:will|dc:33|basic:true]豁免）。

Warbal Bumblebrasher.name: 瓦宝·吵闹踉跄鬼 Warbal Bumblebrasher

equipment-History of the Bumblebrashers.name: 《来自伊斯嘉的吵闹踉跄鬼部落的历史》 History of the Bumblebrashers in Isger

Goblin Scuttle.name: 地精快步 Goblin Scuttle
Goblin Scuttle.description:
触发 一个地精盟友结束移动后和瓦宝相邻。

效果 瓦宝进行一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{快步 Steps}。

Heatsight.name: Heatsight
Heatsight.description: Heatsight is a precise sense that sees heat signatures。

Dream Haunting.name: Dream Haunting
Dream Haunting.description: A target that fails its save against the wendigo's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare} is exposed to wendigo torment。

Howl.name: Howl
Howl.description:
频率 Three times per day

效果 The wendigo unleashes a forlorn howl that can be heard up to 1 mile away. Any creature that hears the howl must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:38] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}. Any creature that critically fails and is within 120 feet of the wendigo is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}, and is also fleeing for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} (or until it's no longer frightened, whichever comes first)。

A creature frightened by a wendigo's howl still naturally recovers from its fright but can't reduce it below frightened 1 in this way until 1 hour has passed or magic is used. Whether it succeeds or fails its save, a creature is then temporarily immune to that wendigo's Howl for 24 hours。

Ride the Wind.name: Ride the Wind
Ride the Wind.description:
触发 The wendigo casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.U0hL0LLaprcnAyzC]{Wind Walk} while it has Grabbed a foe。

效果 The wendigo attempts to turn the grabbed creature into wind and carry it along as part of the action. If the target succeeds at a @Check[type:will|dc:38] save, it prevents itself from being transformed; in this case, the wendigo still transforms, automatically releasing the victim. A creature forced to Ride the Wind along with the wendigo is exposed to wendigo torment。

The target can attempt a new Will save each round to return to normal, though it immediately becomes corporeal and begins falling if it succeeds。

Wendigo Torment.name: Wendigo Torment
Wendigo Torment.description:
A creature affected by wendigo torment can't recover beyond stage 1 until it has been restored to full HP。

豁免检定 @Check[type:will|dc:38]

阶段1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 4} (1天)

阶段2 如阶段1 (1天)

阶段3 The creature searches for an individual of its own ancestry to kill and devour. It then becomes affected by wind walk and sprints into the sky so fast that its feet burn away into jagged stumps. As the creature wind walks into the sky, it is replaced by a new wendigo over [[/r 2d6 #minutes]]{2d6 minutes}。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{Wish}, similar magic, or a 9th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrect} ritual can return the victim to life. The new wendigo remains even if the victim is resurrected。

Wrath of the Destroyer.name: 毁灭者之怒 Wrath of the Destroyer
Wrath of the Destroyer.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:29|name:Disrupt the Divine Magic|traits:complex,magical,trap,hazard](专家)可以打断神术魔法，@Check[type:religion|dc:29|name:Placate Wrathful Energies|traits:complex,magical,trap,hazard](专家)能够抚平狂怒的能量，或者使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}（5环法术；反制DC26）。
Wrath of the Destroyer.hazarddescription: 这些沉重的大门上雕刻着达哈克的画像，其中回响的强大仇恨能够杀死靠近门边的任何人，于此同时会有达哈克的龙头幻象从门中浮现出来啃咬敌人。
Wrath of the Destroyer.reset: 若范围内持续1分钟没有任何生物存在的话，陷阱便会关闭并重置。
Wrath of the Destroyer.routine: (1动作) 轮到危害的先攻时，毁灭者之怒会以区域C6中最靠近的目标设为致命神祇之容的目标。
Wrath of the Destroyer.stealthdetails: (专家)来注意到门上遍布的魔法能量所产生的少量蒸汽。

Expunge.name: 抹除 Expunge
Expunge.description:
触发 一名不是达哈克信徒的生物碰触前往区域C7两扇大门中的一扇；

效果 危害以该生物作为致命神祇之容的目标，之后投掷先攻。

Face of the Fatal Divine.name: 致命神祇之容 Face of the Fatal Divine
Face of the Fatal Divine.description: 该生物注视着达哈克的容颜浮现出来并张开燃烧着的巨口啃咬他，该生物会成为@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tlcrVRqW1MSKJ5IC]{魅影杀手 Phantasmal Killer}（5环法术，@Check[type:will|dc:29|traits:complex,hazard,magical,trap]）。

Xevalorg.name: 塞瓦洛格 Xevalorg
Xevalorg.publicNotes:
古革巨人最为骇人的特征莫过于它桶状的头部，这脑袋从中垂直裂开，露出一排排锋利的黄色锐齿和张开的咽喉。它小而敏锐的眼睛长在头颚的两侧。骨脊保护它的眼睛不受猎物疯狂拍打的伤害，因为比起蘑菇和霉菌，它更喜欢新鲜扭动的活肉。它的手臂从手肘部分分裂成一对前臂，从而形成了四个爪子，能够用其手臂牢牢抓住猎物。这些可怖生物的全身长满了浓密的黑色毛皮，常常满布血污。

尽管古革巨人看起来像是野兽，但它们其实有着机敏邪恶的智慧。古革巨人居住在地底的深处，但它们有时会在黑夜中独自或是成群结队地来到地面狩猎。由于其贪婪的胃口，大多数古革巨人都会直接吃掉被捕获的猎物。但也有一些会绑架受害者，将其拖到地底，只留下挥之不去的恶臭和奇怪的爪痕。受害者会被带到有着奇怪符文的腐臭巢穴，而后献祭给古革巨人那司掌鲜血、黑暗和梦魇的邪恶神祇。有恐怖的谣言宣称，在深邃的地底，有着由巨大石块所建造的无光的古革巨人城市，在那里，强大的古革巨人领袖向一群嚎叫着的古革巨人宣扬它们邪恶的教义。

古革巨人和食尸鬼之间有一种奇怪的联系，似乎可以追溯到它们共同起源的那个遥远的地下世界。虽然古革巨人要比食尸鬼高大的多，它们却生活在对食尸鬼的恐惧之中；然而这种奇特的恐惧却并不适用于妖鬼，古革巨人照样把它们当做盘中美餐。

古革巨人身高16英尺，重达2000磅，它们用怪异而又优雅的步态掩饰了其巨大的体型。轻盈的步伐和能够从狭小缝隙中挤过的能力使得古革巨人成为了怪异失踪或血腥屠杀的传说中常见的怪物。

一些尤为嗜血的古革巨人从它们怪异可怖的赞助者那里获得了可怖的力量作为奖赏。这些被称为首脑的怪物强度从不低于12级，并且获得了一些异能内在法术。虽然每个首脑的详细法术组合各不相同，但通常情况下这些法术都可以提供隐形能力、操纵和改变岩石的能力、或是直接在活生生的肉体上引发可怕的毁灭性能量。

Eerie Flexibility.name: 怪异柔韧 Eerie Flexibility
Eerie Flexibility.description: 与其体型无关，塞瓦洛格的诸多关节允许它如同中型生物一般通过狭窄的空间。当挤入空间时，它能以全速移动。

Furious Claws.name: 狂怒利爪 Furious Claws
Furious Claws.description: 塞瓦洛格进行四次爪抓打击，每次针对不同的目标。这些攻击全部计入塞瓦洛格的多重攻击减值，但是仅当塞瓦洛格完成所有攻击后才会累计减值。

Xotani, The Firebleeder.name: Xotani, The Firebleeder
Xotani, The Firebleeder.publicNotes:
A monstrosity of living flame and magma, Xotani may be the weakest of Rovagug's spawn, but it remains a formidable threat. Xotani was slain in 2104 AR by an alliance of spellcasters, but recently its deathlike slumber was interrupted. Its corpse twitches, signaling that it might be close to returning。

The spawn are titanic terrors of immense size and strength that live only to destroy. Tarrasque and Xotani are but two of Rovagug's spawn. Others, including Chemnosit (the Monarch Worm), Kothogaz (the Dance of Disharmony), and Volnagur (the End-Singer) hold places of horror in the history of various regions, but the most famed is Ulunat (the Unholy First), whose beetle-like carcass remains sprawled in Sothis, the capital of Osirion。

Firebleed.name: Firebleed
Firebleed.description:
触发 Xotani is damaged

效果 Xotani's wound erupts with magma in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], dealing [[/r {6d8}[fire]]]{6d8火焰伤害} and [[/r {6d8}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true]豁免)。

Light Blindness.name: 强光致盲 Light Blindness
Light Blindness.description: Xotani's light blindness is caused by only sunlight。

Reactive.name: Reactive
Reactive.description: Xotani gains 3 reactions each round. It can still use only one reaction per trigger。

Bomb Barrage.name: Bomb Barrage
Bomb Barrage.description: Xotani makes three lava bomb Strikes. These Strikes can be made against the same creature or different creatures, as long as all targets are within 40 feet of each other。

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
Xotani breathes a blast of flame that deals [[/r {18d6}[fire]]]{18d6火焰伤害} plus [[/r {4d6}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害} to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:70] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true]豁免)。

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Trample.name: 践踏 Trample
Trample.description:
Huge or smaller, claw, @Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true] save. When Xotani Tramples, it can Stride up to triple its Speed。

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Trample]

Explosion.name: Explosion
Explosion.description: When a Xotanispawn dies, it explodes, dealing [[/r {15d8}[fire]]]{15d8火焰伤害} to creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:39|basic:true]豁免)。

Internal Furnace.name: Internal Furnace
Internal Furnace.description:
触发 A creature adjacent to the Xotanispawn touches it or hits it with a physical attack

效果 The triggering creature takes [[/r {5d8}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect] save to negate)。

Breath Weapon.name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.description:
The Xotanispawn sprays a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of magma that deals [[/r {10d10}[fire]]]{10d10火焰伤害} and [[/r {2d6}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害} to all creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:39|basic:true]豁免)。

The Xotanispawn can't use its Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}。

Heat Surge.name: Heat Surge
Heat Surge.description: When the Xotanispawn critically hits, its body surges with heat, increasing the damage of its Internal Furnace to [[/r {10d8}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害} until the start of its next turn。

Adroit Disarm.name: Adroit Disarm
Adroit Disarm.description: The Zephyr Guard attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} a creature, with a +2 circumstance bonus to the roll. On a critical success, the guard can also deal their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitar} damage to the creature。

Hampering Shot.name: Hampering Shot
Hampering Shot.description: The Zephyr Guard makes a heavy crossbow Strike that deals one additional weapon damage die. If the Strike hits, the target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}. These last for 1 round, or 2 rounds if the Strike was a critical success。

Subduing Strikes.name: Subduing Strikes
Subduing Strikes.description: A Zephyr Guard takes no penalty for making nonlethal attacks with a weapon that doesn't have the nonlethal trait. The guard's nonlethal Strikes against a creature that is not wielding a weapon deal an additional [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6伤害}。

Infused Items.name: 灌注物品 Infused Items
Infused Items.description: 祖菲利安的灌注物品持续24小时，或直到她下一次日常准备。

Alchemical Formulas.name: 炼金公式 Alchemical Formulas
Alchemical Formulas.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.jC8GmH0Un6vDxdMj]{高等强酸瓶 Acid Flask (Greater)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.n5yTlTs63o53n3k6]{高等炽火胶 Alchemist's Fire (Greater)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.r2iTRbt1zpkAqHj2]{高等瓶装闪电 Bottled Lightning (Greater)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.bz8Y8bVUe7QfBk9g]{高等黑暗视觉灵药 Darkvision Elixir (Greater)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.87AzvRja9uQOLJCC]{死帽粉 Deathcap Powder}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.mYozcVg9fQY6zO7C]{高等生命灵药 Elixir of Life (Greater)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.intVPcEzbE9o4NQd]{高等霜冻瓶 Frost Vial (Greater)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.zo0ophqfKunJFxZN]{昏睡毒 Lethargy Poison}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.iRDCa4OVSTGUD3vi]{紫虫毒 Purple Worm Venom}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.5Qkz4RVJr2Kx3RL6]{高等绊足包 Tanglefoot Bag (Greater)}

Expanded Splash.name: 溅射扩展 Expanded Splash
Expanded Splash.description: 祖菲利安的具有泼溅特征的炸弹造成8点额外溅射伤害，溅射范围变为10尺。

Quick Alchemy.name: 高速炼金 Quick Alchemy
Quick Alchemy.description: 祖菲利安从她的公式簿中（见炼金公式）创造单个炼金物品。该物品具有灌注特征，但它的效用仅会存续至她的下个回合开始为止。根据她的每日准备，她每日可以使用该能力7次。

Quick Bomber.name: 高速投弹手 Quick Bomber
Quick Bomber.description: 祖菲利安用交互动作取出一个炸弹，之后用它进行打击。

True Debilitating Bomb.name: 真实衰弱炸弹 True Debilitating Bomb
True Debilitating Bomb.description:
祖菲利安已经为过去发明的炸弹找到了更具毁灭性的方式去阻碍和束缚敌人。当她使用衰弱炸弹时，将后述效果添加到可选效果列表中：

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}
  • 在速度上造成-15尺的状态减值。

如果祖菲利安没有从上述列表中挑选衰弱炸弹效果，那么祖菲利安可以让目标只有在豁免检定上取得大成功时才能避免衰弱炸弹的效果。

Uncanny Bombs.name: 诡奇炸弹 Uncanny Bombs
Uncanny Bombs.description: 当祖菲利安投掷一枚具有炸弹特征的炼金物品时，它的射程增量提升至60尺，目标在AC上来自于掩蔽的任何环境加值都会减少1，而你祖菲利安在目标为隐蔽生物时进行的裸骰检定上自动取得成功。

Barushak Il-Varashma.name: 巴鲁沙克·依克瓦什玛 Barushak Il-Varashma

yggAbFpFmUKjj7Bz.name: 汲取连结物品 Drain Bonded Item
yggAbFpFmUKjj7Bz.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 巴鲁沙克本回合还未行动

效果 本回合，巴鲁沙克能施放一个他在当日已经施放过的已准备法术而不会消耗法术位。他仍需施法并满足法术的其他要求。

0z7Fxpm5UuCECxe5.name: 高效抓捕 Efficient Capture
0z7Fxpm5UuCECxe5.description:
需求 巴鲁沙克的手中有镣铐而且与一名生物相邻

效果 巴鲁沙克尝试用镣铐束缚该生物的手腕或脚踝。他必须成功通过一次调整值为[[/r 1d20+21 #Manacles]]{+21}的攻击检定对抗目标的AC。

pIKbKs8nTXF2nUAm.name: 魔族召唤师 Fiend Summoner
pIKbKs8nTXF2nUAm.description: 巴鲁沙克能以奥术法术施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.29ytKctjg7qSW2ff]{召唤魔族 Summon Fiend}。每当他这么做时，污秽的能量会流经他的躯体，他的双眼会放出红光并让他在3轮内获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态。他只能使用额外动作来维持法术。

MYgT9dmiyGDI48Hx.name: 高阶召唤师 Superlative Summoner
MYgT9dmiyGDI48Hx.description: 若其他生物的反应动作将要打断巴鲁沙克的施法动作，巴鲁沙克能尝试一次 @Check[type:flat|dc:15]检定。若他检定成功，则该动作不会被打断。

equipment-Keys to Each Dormitory Door an.name: 能开启每扇宿舍门和奴隶镣铐的钥匙 Keys to Each Dormitory Door and Slave Manacles

Barzillai's Hounds.name: 巴基莱的猎犬 Barzillai's Hounds
Barzillai's Hounds.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:24|name:Exorcise the Hounds|traits:complex,haunt,hazard]（专家）来驱魔（这么做需要两个动作）
Barzillai's Hounds.hazarddescription: 对除了受害者以外所有人来说都是隐形的地狱犬将会焚烧他们的目标
Barzillai's Hounds.reset: 若指定目标死亡或者猎犬无法在一回合内触及到指定目标，猎犬便会消失在令人生厌的烟雾中，但它们会在下次日落之后再次出现在这座城市的其他地点
Barzillai's Hounds.routine: （2动作） 猎犬会使用它的第一个动作行走，若指定目标在它的触及范围，则用第二个动作对其指定目标作出啃咬打击。若目标不在触及范围内，猎犬便会重置。

1sYunHFicjStIbRN.name: 开始狩猎 Begin the Hunt
1sYunHFicjStIbRN.description:
触发 一名没有公开佩戴阿斯摩蒂斯徽记的生物进入距离作祟初始位置60尺范围内时；

效果 猎犬出现在被选择的目标面前，并开始疯狂地嚎叫并追赶该生物。作祟投掷先攻。其他人无法听到或看到狂吠的猎犬而且必须进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}来判断猎犬的位置。

6XZ1oUx9X7nxnnLP.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
6XZ1oUx9X7nxnnLP.description: 贝尔玛佐格喷出 30 尺锥形的酸液，造成10d6酸液伤害（DC28基础反射豁免）。贝尔玛佐格在 1d4轮内无法再次吐息。

naVs815EnCcnoaW1.name: 淹没之音 Drowning Drone
naVs815EnCcnoaW1.description:
触发 贝尔玛佐格或他的60尺内的一名盟友尝试豁免检定对抗听觉或音波效果

效果 贝尔玛佐格会发出低沉的鸣叫压过其他声音。他要投掷一次表演检定。若贝尔玛佐格和他位于区域内的沼蜍盟友可以进行选择，在贝尔玛佐格的表演检定和他们的豁免结果中取较高的数值，并以此来判断对抗听觉或音波效果后产生的效果。

zRPB5eZcHteseFIt.name: Nul-Acrumi Vazghul Ritual
zRPB5eZcHteseFIt.description: 这个罕见且高度专业化的仪式，是红三一教给贝尔玛佐格的，让她能利用达哈克的化石遗骸增幅周边龙之柱的力量，但在本次冒险中，贝尔玛佐格已经没有时间和资源再次施放此仪式。因此，PC无法学习该仪式，也无法从仪式中受益，所以这里并未打算提供更多和冒险本身无关的更多信息。

SdtmvPS7LAUlE41O.name: 沼泽奔行 Swamp Stride
SdtmvPS7LAUlE41O.description: 贝尔玛佐格能忽略由于沼泽地形特征产生的困难地形。

2OGTeZ56MmSCLl9P.name: 恐惧鸣叫 Terrifying Croak
2OGTeZ56MmSCLl9P.description: 贝尔玛佐格发出可怕的鸣叫声。30尺范围内的任何非沼蜍人都会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}，除非他们能够成功通过@Check[type:will|dc:28]豁免；豁免中掷出大成功的生物会在1分钟内临时免疫该能力。

wqr4H9kTRu8PWkfc.name: 蛙舌攫抓 Tongue Grab
wqr4H9kTRu8PWkfc.description: 若贝尔玛佐格用蛙舌命中1个生物，那么该生物会被他@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}。与一般的攫抓不同，该生物不会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}，但是他也无法移动至贝尔玛佐格的蛙舌触及范围之外。生物可以通过命中AC25并造成至少8点挥砍伤害来切开蛙舌。尽管这么做不会对贝尔玛佐格造成伤害，但它可以使贝尔玛佐格无法再次使用蛙舌打击，直至贝尔玛佐格通过一星期的休息才能够重新使用蛙舌。

Blood Boar.name: 寻血野猪 Blood Boar
Blood Boar.publicNotes:
寻血野猪是一类由切利亚斯培育的骇人猪类，其只为一个目的而生：追捕潜逃的奴隶。该物种源自栖息于奈多那阴暗的乌斯克森林中的一类体型巨大且凶暴的野猪，寻血野猪保留了它们祖先的灰色皮毛、红色眼睛和特殊的感官。为培育寻血野猪所采用的精细化的饲养方式——通过选择性地使用魔法——赋予了它们无与伦比的血液感知，包括精确地探测身上沾血的动物的位置和行动的能力，使得这些野猪能在一英里外追踪猎物。

寻血野猪的饲养员为它们梳洗并标记，让它们本就令人不安的外表更加可怖。虽然从远处看，寻血野猪可能会被误认为是普通的猪，但靠近了看，它们之间的区别显而易见。血红的眼睛、灰白的鬃毛和非自然的锋利獠牙点缀在组成了了这具躯体的百磅肌肉上，透过这头野猪煞白的血肉，能看见它的一条条血管。锁链、镣铐和尖刺都是寻血野猪身上常见的配饰，用于确保这头野猪尽可能的吓人。

寻血野猪仅凭目标的血液气味就能追踪猎物的能力一直是许多小偷、强盗、有时候还是一些出轨者的心病，但没有人比追求自由的奴隶更害怕这些野兽。如果寻血野猪已经嗅到了气味，即使洗掉溅出来的血也无法阻止它的追逐。因此，铃花会中的许多半身人热衷于练习卸除武装和非致命的格斗技术，就是为了避免在逃跑期间意外流血。

pWNu3N2Ovu0m978Z.name: 循血追猎 Blood Quarry
pWNu3N2Ovu0m978Z.description: 当闻到某个生物的血时，寻血野猪可以指定该生物为它的猎物。寻血野猪在一英里外都能闻到该猎物的气味。一头寻血野猪一次只能有一个猎物。

ZYT8B7LGfrmxllL4.description: 寻血野猪能精确地感知到60尺内流血的生物。
ZYT8B7LGfrmxllL4.name: 血液感知 Bloodsense

GynHyVx5cEZ0vb9p.name: 追捕 Chase Down
GynHyVx5cEZ0vb9p.description: 寻血野猪向它的猎物行走，无视困难地形，这次移动在速度上获+10尺环境加值。

7LPUMs664rIwb4pr.description:
寻血野猪发出一声令人毛骨悚然的尖叫。30 尺内的生物必须成功通过@Check[type:will|dc:23]豁免否则获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}（大失败获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}）。

如果寻血野猪在合使用追捕后的同一回使用骇人尖啸，意志豁免DC改为@Check[type:will|dc:25]。
7LPUMs664rIwb4pr.name: 骇人尖啸 Terrifying Squeal

Charau-ka Dragon Priest.name: 查喀龙牧师 Charau-ka Dragon Priest

OC3Cenu8w3vfySOp.name: 卷尾 Twisting Tail
OC3Cenu8w3vfySOp.description:
触发 有生物在龙牧师的尾扫触及范围内使用移动动作或者在他使用的一次移动动作的过程中离开一个方格

效果 龙牧师对该生物作出一次承受-2减值的尾扫打击。若命中，则会中断该生物的动作

P54JJ58qynLo2URI.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
P54JJ58qynLo2URI.description:
龙牧师喷出火焰对@Template[type:cone|distance:30]区域造成[[/r {7d6}[fire]]]{7d6点火焰伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true]豁免）。

他在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}内无法再次使用喷吐武器。

0rm1ESKWoiQPJPo1.name: 暴怒尖啸 Shrieking Frenzy
0rm1ESKWoiQPJPo1.description:
触发 查咯龙牧师的回合开始

频率 每小时一次

效果 查咯龙牧师获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态，直到它的下一回合结束，并且他可以用此额外动作打击或行走。在狂怒生效期间，由于查咯龙牧师不断大声嚎叫，因此无法说话，隐秘检定也会自动失败。

7067hk1ZShJt1wS4.name: 精通投掷武器 Thrown Weapon Mastery
7067hk1ZShJt1wS4.description: 查咯龙牧师的投掷武器获得“致命D6”特征。此外，如果查咯龙牧师投掷一件临时武器，既不会因此受到-2 减值，也不会因为投掷一件具有非致命特征的临时武器来造成致命伤害而受到减值。

JZbnTWFBrM3l78qS.name: 地火喷发 Volcanic Eruption
JZbnTWFBrM3l78qS.description:
需求 龙牧师站在地面上。

效果 龙牧师用他的拳头猛击地面，让火焰从地面上喷发出来。每个位于@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]区域内、站在地上且不是达哈克信徒的生物都必须成功通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|traits:damaging-effect]豁免，失败则会@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}并承受[[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]+{2d6}[fire]]]{1d6钝击伤害和2d6火焰伤害}。

Am5pbCNVDkDBNz5Y.name: 恶臭 Stench
Am5pbCNVDkDBNz5Y.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光 Aura}

有生物进入灵光区域或在其回合开始时位于灵光区域内时，必须成功通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]豁免，失败则会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}（大失败时只要处于它的恶心状态就会附加@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}）。

在处于灵光内时，受影响的生物在对抗疾病的豁免以及从恶心状态恢复的豁免中承受-2 环境减值。成功通过豁免的生物会在1分钟内临时免疫该效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.wX9L6fbqVMLP05hn]{效果：恶臭}

DEoIu6kGyGbwbSn3.name: 啃肉 Consume Flesh
DEoIu6kGyGbwbSn3.description:
需求 惨白穴熊与某个在过去1小时内死亡的生物的尸体相邻

效果 惨白穴熊啃下一大块尸体并恢复[[/r {6d6}[healing]]]{6d6生命值}。

它只能从每个尸体恢复1次生命值。

j3NCaHUgoOUiHpye.name: 妖鬼热 Ghast Fever
j3NCaHUgoOUiHpye.description:
豁免骰 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

阶段 1 携带病原但没有不良效果（1天）；

阶段 2 [[/r {3d8}[negative]]]{3d8负能量伤害}且从任何治疗获得的生命值恢复均减半（1天）

阶段 3 同阶段2（1天）

阶段 4 [[/r {3d8}[negative]]]{3d8负能量伤害}且无法从治疗获得任何好处（1天）

阶段 5 同阶段 4（1天）

阶段 6 死亡，并在下一日的午夜以@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.VC7rtYR4hLxwg7WZ]{妖鬼 Ghast}复生

gncjMzeBqmNqD4vz.name: 擅长搏击 Mauler
gncjMzeBqmNqD4vz.description: 惨白穴熊在对抗被它@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}的生物时，伤害检定获得+4环境加值。

eCRAMtpF3k73LRFd.name: 麻痹 Paralysis
eCRAMtpF3k73LRFd.description: 任何被惨白穴熊的攻击命中的活物必须成功进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]豁免，失败则会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}。被麻痹的生物能够在每次自身回合结束时尝试一次新的豁免，每次尝试上述豁免都会使得DC累计降低1点。

Heuberk Thropp.name: 霍博克·斯洛普 Heuberk Thropp

jZFyZg8r1I1EWoBY.name: 适时扰乱 Timely Distraction
jZFyZg8r1I1EWoBY.description:
触发 有霍博克能看到且处于霍博克近战触及范围内的生物对霍博克作出近战打击，但是攻击失手

效果 霍博克对该生物尝试@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint}。若此时并非霍博克的回合而且他的虚招成功，那么该效果适用于他的下个回合。

hZNyCnxdujLVMKqb.name: 寻找突破口 Identify an Opening
hZNyCnxdujLVMKqb.description:
需求 有生物在对抗霍博克的下次近战攻击时陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

效果 霍博克指出该生物防御上的漏洞。霍博克的所有听到并理解该指令的盟友对该生物尝试的全部近战攻击均会将该生物视为陷入措手不及，持续至霍博克的下个回合开始为止。

BCcVa7LcDbfMataD.name: 复生 Rejuvenation
BCcVa7LcDbfMataD.description: 当巫妖被摧毁时，其灵魂会立即转移到内。@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NEbr7nKuiluJgBHT]{命匣 Soul Cage}只有先找到并摧毁巫妖的命匣，才能永久摧毁该命匣对应的巫妖。

gca4Y5kOq7GHUaJp.name: 石之骨 Bones of Stone
gca4Y5kOq7GHUaJp.description:
需求 目标站在石质表面上或者与石质表面相邻

频率 每轮一次

效果 贾伽基召唤大地中的骚动精魂，让一只由锯齿状的石头构成的巨人骸骨手臂从60尺范围内的石质表面上伸向相邻的 1 名生物。贾伽基通过这支石质手臂作出手摸打击对抗目标，而非使用自己的手臂。若打击命中，它会造成额外[[/r {4d6}[bludgeoning]]]{4d6点钝击伤害}。

T3t1bWcAoYCVuiiE.name: 汲取命匣 Drain Soul Cage
T3t1bWcAoYCVuiiE.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 贾伽基释放其@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NEbr7nKuiluJgBHT]{命匣 Soul Cage's}的力量，以此来施放任意奥术法术，该法术的环级最高为贾伽基自身所能施放法术的最高环级，该法术即便不在贾伽基的已准备法术内也可以施放。

贾伽基使用该能力不需要其命匣在场。

pLURCvEu8rYktiZE.name: 麻痹之触 Paralyzing Touch
pLURCvEu8rYktiZE.description:
被贾伽基的手摸打击所伤害的生物必须通过强韧豁免对抗@Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]。

失败则会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}，持续1轮。大失败时，该生物会被永久麻痹，@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}且看起来与死了无异。通过@Check[type:medicine|dc:25|name:Diagnose Paralysis]检定能揭示出该受害者还活着。

L10IjFT5OxF7Vdtw.name: 镇定施法 Steady Spellcasting
L10IjFT5OxF7Vdtw.description: 若其他生物的反应动作将要打断贾伽基的施法动作，贾伽基能尝试DC15的纯骰检定。若检定成功，他的动作就不会被打断。

Kalavakus.name: 缚魂魔 Kalavakus
Kalavakus.publicNotes:
缚魂魔在深渊担任奴隶贩子，这为他们赢得了“贩奴恶魔”的绰号；这些恶魔把捕获的受害者聚集起来，然后卖给其他恶魔或寡廉鲜耻的凡人。对自由或仁慈的请求充耳不闻，因为贩奴恶魔们认为他们能抓住并看牢的任何人都是他们的合法财产，任他们出售。缚灵魔所知的不仅是物理上拘束奴隶的方法；他们还知道如何束缚受害者的灵魂。最成功的贩奴恶魔在深渊里有巨大的奴隶坑，那里保管着他囚禁的灵魂。

贩奴恶魔源自奴隶贩子、在自己的领地上鼓励人口贩卖的暴君、对非法奴隶活动视而不见的官僚们的灵魂。

n6SPErVyS2S3b3lv.name: 长角圈套 Horn Snare
n6SPErVyS2S3b3lv.description:
触发 一个生物对缚魂魔的近战武器打击失手

效果 缚魂魔以-2减值来尝试@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}触发打击的武器。若成功，他转而视作获得大成功。恶魔不需要空出手来使用这个能力。

oIJ6ppXsMXZMBfSi.name: 反感解放 Liberation Vulnerability
oIJ6ppXsMXZMBfSi.description: 每轮中，当一个生物第一次从缚魂魔的奴役灵魂中逃脱或恶魔目睹一个生物从囚禁或精神奴役中被释放时，恶魔会受到[[/r {3d6}[mental]]]{3d6心灵伤害}。

abiEy2lj68FImtR8.name: 奴役灵魂 Enslave Soul
abiEy2lj68FImtR8.description:
恶魔奴役60尺内一个活物的灵魂。目标能进行@Check[type:will|dc:29]豁免来尝试抵抗奴役。

一个缚魂魔一次只能奴役一个活着的灵魂，并且同一个灵魂不能被超过一个缚魂魔奴役。如果一个奴隶恶魔杀死了一个被它奴役灵魂的生物，这个恶魔将恢复20点生命，并且这个灵魂将在深渊中接受永恒的苦役，加到缚魂魔的灵魂账目上，并允许这个恶魔奴役另一个灵魂。

成功 目标避免被奴役，并临时免疫24小时。

失败 目标被奴役并@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，持续24小时或直到缚魂魔被击杀，取先发生的为准。

大失败 如同失败，目标还受到等同于@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{命令术 Dominate}豁免失败的效果。

equipment-Key Ring (Opens Locks in Summe.name: 钥匙串（用来打开蔽夏花岗岩采石场内的锁）

MyJ5pEba9K3unoCm.name: 箭术专精 Archery Experience
MyJ5pEba9K3unoCm.description: 拉斯伦不会受到远射特征带来的近射减值，并且她的远程打击不会触发反应动作。

wmpfvEE1W9Sses2l.name: 命令之吠 Bark Orders
wmpfvEE1W9Sses2l.description: 拉斯伦大声命令盟友改变阵型。所有能听见她并能听懂她这道命令的盟友能以一个反应动作进行快步。

Ps0fTafFUadvtLAi.name: 高效抓捕 Efficient Capture
Ps0fTafFUadvtLAi.description:
需求 拉斯伦手里持握镣铐，并且和一个生物相邻

效果 拉斯伦试图用镣铐绑住该生物的手腕或腿部。她进行一次[[/r 1d20+28 #Manacles]]{+28}的攻击骰，对抗目标的AC，如果成功，她将用镣铐捆缚该生物的手腕或腿部。

j95Y0cxi70Mb6UMQ.name: 如履平地 Rugged Travel
j95Y0cxi70Mb6UMQ.description: 每次当拉斯伦通过快步或行走进入困难地行时，她忽略第一个方格中的困难地形。

tHzRquAwQcwKEsgJ.name: 出色围攻 Superior Pack Attack
tHzRquAwQcwKEsgJ.description: 拉斯伦对于任何至少位于她的一个盟友的触及范围内的生物造成额外[[/r {2d8}]]{2d8伤害}。

p9DHIoccyeBea4Yd.name: 双发连击 Twin Shot
p9DHIoccyeBea4Yd.description: 拉斯伦用她的弓，以当前的多重攻击减值进行两次打击。如果两次攻击都击中同一生物，合并伤害后再计算一次目标的抗力和弱点。这在计算她的多重攻击减值时算作两次攻击。

Mercenary Sailor.name: 雇佣水手 Mercenary Sailor
Mercenary Sailor.speed: 灵活移动, 舷侧的优雅

G04XQpPTsP0scmx5.name: 舷侧的优雅 Shipboard Grace
G04XQpPTsP0scmx5.description: 雇佣水手身处于船只上时，不会在@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{保持平衡 Balancing}或@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climbing}中陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

9RaYMbm66QxVktif.name: 舷侧巧击 Shipboard Savvy
9RaYMbm66QxVktif.description: 雇佣水手的近战打击造成[[/r {2d6}[precision]]]{2d6 额外精准伤害}，但前提是雇佣水手和打击目标都身处船只之上。

Mobility.name: 灵巧移动 Mobility
Mobility.description: 雇佣水手进行一次行走动作，移动距离为自身速度的一半或更短，此次移动不会触发反应动作。

Mialari Docur.name: 米拉瑞·多可儿 Mialari Docur

kg205YMOcrEz6XQw.name: 远程手法 Ranged Legerdemain
kg205YMOcrEz6XQw.description: 米拉瑞能以念动执行需要使用贼活技能的动作，射程30尺。但是当她如此做时，其技能检定受到-2环境减值。
